40026021	Mininasani Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na memokoba sane. Ninae-una zo mene na keregairo iwora waweng pugariniya.”
40026022	Ayero senu buro-mani nuna dubo mininasani dekaong dekaong nung atata yero sewa, “Tuwa, na eno sinesita?”
40026023	Ayero sewa nune eyero sena, “Na aune dema ame sura dusarinenato nung amimene na keregariniya.
40026024	Na Emora Mani mene nagibo na eno sero gaewa auna babari sero nena ara. Arata emo na keregariniya nung awiya, oiye! abena nuna nono yao pumariniye? Ai nung oko pumao yatiya, awiya nung meko oko yatiya.”
40026025	Ayero senu Yudas keregao emo amimene deka ayero nung atata yero sena, “Gipao emo, na eno sinesita?” Ayero senu abena eyero sena, “Sinesa ara.” Ayero sena arauwa.
40026026	Awong nona mininasani mitiwa Yesu mene poro puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero eegairo buro-mani nuna eno pugatinasani eyero sena, “Puro minipu. Ewiya goi nana.”
40026027	Ayero sero awang ou wainne zo puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero awong eno pugatinasani eyero sena, “Niye apakana amimene minipu.
40026028	Ewiya yu nana. Yu amimene Tuwa Bayau aune tairo nao auna ge inai tau yariniya. Emo bauno daigairo auna pasena disaise yasagarinena.
40026029	Sana nigipu. Na ou wain yeme mininenane ewiya doro oko minao nete Mama nana nata Tuwa yai aune niye aune dema ou wain seka zo minarinenane ara.” Ayero sena ara.
40026030	Awong yere zo gauno aune iropuro Yerusalem doro baungno diri yazo Oliwa auna witiro mitiwa ara.
40026031	Nagibe atu bautunasani aune Yesu mene eyero sena, “Ping eune niye apakana awang yero na doro zanarineya. Noeno okowata, ge gayao zo eyero mitiya awiya me yariniya, Na Tuwa Bayau mene wo sipsip diya emo dana magayai wo sipsip sisi-bura-bura yarineya.
40026032	Arata na magayaora atu iropuro Galilaya tawingna babana niye ago bumarineya.”
40026033	Ayero senu Petoro mene eyero sena, “Awong apakana ewiya iwo awang yero ning yangduwaya nane zo ning oko yangduwarinena.”
40026034	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na memoko sana nigi. Nine ping eune kokora ge oko saore na bewae yasa be etama yariniya.”
40026035	Ayero senu Petoro mene eyero sena, “Awong na ning aune dema daya magayanese sarineya, arata saineba, na ning oko bewae yarinena.” Ayero senu buro-mani otao mani ena mene deka ayero nung soreuno sewa ara.
40026036	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune bautunete i buro zo yazo Gesemani auna kasa yero Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Niye etu adungno mitaya nane zo otu baungno isa sarinena.”
40026037	Ayero sero Petoro aune Zebedira mani etobe puro bamuwa ara. Bamuwa Yesu nung dubo mininasani dubo mou yenu
40026038	awong eno eyero sena, “Na dubo minao bainane tapunena dubo minao mene na puro wosi magayanese niya. Arare niye na aune dema etu seka mitasani umo neupu.”
40026039	Ayero sero awong doro baungno ake yero diti benaungne nuna pu tawingna gairo eyero sinasani isa sena, “Mama nana, ning nigasa yaine yao yai giro yaya baina ewiya na daigae. Arata ge nana okowata, ge nina mene me yaise.”
40026040	Isa ayero sero mani etamara-una kapetegairo awong auriti awinewa giro Petoro eno eyero sena, “Niye na aune dema aua dekaongka gege seka yero mitao teng oko, awiya!
40026041	Niye etegaora atu iyangyao eno, seka yero mitasani isa sepu. Dubo ninae mene buro iwaing yaora eo niya, arata taung mene zo mou niya.” Ayero sena ara.
40026042	Arare nung nupema baungno ge eyero sinasani isa sena, “Mama nana, yaya baina ewiya na daigaise nigasa teng oko yao yai giro saineba diungno aung yana ge nina mene me yae.”
40026043	Isa ayero sero kapetegairo buro-mani awong diti morenu auriti awinasani mitiwa gigina ara.
40026044	Giro doro nupema baungno isa senu be etama yena. Ge gitau sena deka awiya sinasani isa sena ara.
40026045	Isa sero aung yero buro maingna-una kapetegairo eyero sena, “Niye auriti gege awinasani miteya. Be kasa yetiya. Emora Mani keregeya pasena emora waweng wiwitinena.
40026046	Keregao emo butuniya. Iropungpu, nunae-una babanene.”
40026047	Ayero sinenu buro-mani 12 auna otao nunae Yudas mene iwo dubu baina gitau yenu kasa yewa ara. Iwo dubu awiya pirisa babuze aune Yuda emora simai amimene iyengtiwa gorobo yari sero iwire ami dawangne puro buro kasa yewa ara.
40026048	Gitau keregao emo mene iwo dubu baina eno ge zo gipero eyero sena, “Emo nane saniro toko yarinena, nuka ara. Nung awiya saniro pumarineya.”
40026049	Arare kasa yero mena Yesura-una baungno, “O gipao emo nana,” ayero sero toko yena.
40026050	Ayero yenu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Otao, buro nina yari sero bumesa awiya ye aung yae.” Ayero senu awong buro nung puro wawong bunewa ara.
40026051	Anewa Yesu aune dema newa auna-una zo mene iwi nuna geingna atu ininu gururu senu pirisa bainana soumani awiya dari yero dawong nuna kesena ara.
40026052	Ayero yenu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Iwi nina geingna pugai towae. Zo nung gorobo yariniya amimene abena nuna deka awiya gorobo tamariniya.
40026053	Ning susuwa nana mitiya awiya oko gao nasani aeno ayero nesita? Mama nana eno isa sana yemeneka keune angelo 70,000 pugai wosiro na soremateya, arata dotinena.
40026054	Ayero wosiro na soremaya ge gayao mene nagibo nana eyero kasa yaise sinoiya amimene nono yero me yariniye?”
40026055	Ayero sero emo dubu baina nung pumari bumuwa aeno eyero sena, “Niye iwire ami dawangne puro butuneya, awiya gorobo emo zo puro bunari bumaine neya. Be giti awiya na niye aune dema ibu bainana atu yero nona niye atu noeno na oko pumao yero nowi?
40026056	Arata tani ewiya porofete mene ge gaewa awiya me yero aung yaise kasa niya.” Ayero senu buro-mani nuna awong apakana nung doro zanero aung yewa ara.
40026057	Emo Yesu iniro saniwa amimene nung puro baungno pirisa baina yazo nuna Kayafa auna gare puro witiwa. Garo auna atu sao tauyao ge gipao emore simaire amimene augairo mitiwa ara.
40026058	Yesu puro bautunewa Petoro nung ake atu ago nasani pungyero-pungyero baungna ara. Bautunete kasa yero pirisa baina auna-una goma mokora toina ara. Toiro pirisa bainana soumani auna-una towang atu eyero sero adungno mitina, “Yesura ge nono saya tau yariniye, etu mitasani nigane.”
40026059	Arare pirisa babuze arita gitau yao dubu awong teng mitasani emo zo mene Yesu eno ge iwai Yesu gera pugairo daya magayaise sero ge iwao ge yangtaka-betaka yewa ara.
40026060	Ayero nasani ge iwao daigairo sewa kasa yenu nigiwa mou oko yao yenu giro ge iwao ge iwaing zo tamari sero buro nasani mitiwa. Ayero nasani mitiwa emo etobe iropuro eyero sewato,
40026061	“Yesu nung eyero senu nigiwangto, ‘Nane Tuwa Bayaura ibu baina kasero wari be etama gege aung yai nupema yana dopariniya. Na ayero yao ine teng.’ Ayero senu nigiwangto ara.”
40026062	Ayero sewato pirisa baina amimene iropuro Yesu eno eyero sena, “Ning noeno ge nina sineyato auna abena oko sao bora bora yero mitesi?”
40026063	Ayero senu Yesu mene ge abena oko sao bora bora yero dopero mitina ara. Ayero yenu pirisa baina mene nupema atata yero sena, “Tuwa Bayau putoungne auna benaungna ning atata yana se tau yae. Ning Yuda emora Sorao Emo yazo Kristo, Tuwa Bayaura Mani meta aung ing?”
40026064	Atata yenu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Sinesa ara. Arata zo sana nigipu. Nete na Emora Mani mene Tuwa Bayau Putoungne auna wawong mera atu adungno mitana garineya. Na uritira bereze tame adungno mitana wosiro buro kasa yai garineya.”
40026065	Ayero senu pirisa baina amimene ge awiya niginu meko yenu nung taung wori nuka nuna ininu kerenu emo dubu nuna eno eyero sena, “Nung Tuwa Bayau daigari nasani siniya, arare name noeno emo ena buro nung gera pugaese sarinenine?
40026066	Ge meko awiya nika niyetope nigiro no sarinei?” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa,
40026067	“Nung magayaora gerao niya ara.” Ayero sero Yesura benaungna begura pisero nung dero musuna-masuna yewa ara. Anewa ena mene zo wawong petata yero nung sowena dero
40026068	nung eno eyero sewa, “Oiye, Sorao Emo Kristo. Ning porofete me yai giro se, emo ning deduniya auna yazo aweni?”
40026069	Ayero nasani newa Petoro nung goma mokora napo kakame atu mitina ara. Mitinu soumani baunodi zo mene nuna-una baungno eyero sena, “Ning amimene Yesu Galilaya emo oune dema nosa ara.”
40026070	Ayero senu nung emo mitiwa auna benaungna atu bewae nasani eyero sena, “Ning ge sinesa awiya na kau nena.”
40026071	Ayero sero iropuro goma towao bera ina baungno mitinu nupema soumani baunodi zo mene giro emo atu mitiwa aeno eyero sena, “Emo ewiya nung Yesu Nasarete napora aune dema noiya.”
40026072	Ayero senu Petoro mene Tuwa Bayaura benaungna senu tau yenu nupema bewae nasani eyero sena, “Na emo owiya oko gosinona.”
40026073	Ayero sero dodopinenu be apungkaka aung yenu emo mitiwa amimene Petorora-una baungno eyero sewa, “Nae ge mapu nina nigitinenane Galilaya emora ge ine niya. Ning meba dubu nuna-una zo ara.”
40026074	Ayero sewa nung nupema Tuwa Bayaura benaungna ge eyero senu tau yena, “Na ge iwarinena, awiya Tuwa Bayau na dai magayarinena. Na emo awiya oko gosinona.” Ayero sinenu kokora mene ge sena ara.
40026075	Petoro kokora ge nigiro Yesu mene gitau nung eno ge eyero sena awiya kotungna. “Kokora ge oko saore nine na bewae yasa be etama yariniya.” Nung ge awiya kotungno kasa daung yero zi bainakama sena ara.
40027001	Iya gainu pirisa babuzere simaire awong au dekaongna gairo Yesu daya magayaise sewa tau yena ara.
40027002	Ayero yero sewa Yesura wawong etobe bunero puro Romana emo tuwa Pilato auna-una bamuwa ara.
40027003	Magayaise sewa tau yena awiya Yudas keregao emo mene nigiro giro, “noeno ayero yeteni?” ayero sero dubo nuna meko yenu moni pugaiwa awiya puro baungno pirisa babuzere simaire aeno pugaina ara.
40027004	Ayero nasani eyero sena, “Na were-were yero emo pasena aung awiya keregena pumeya.” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Nae no yanenese buro sinesi? Awiya nona nina gege.”
40027005	Ayero sinasani moni awang sewa puro baungno Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana atu augainu witinu nung doro baungno muri zuwero magayena ara.
40027006	Ayero yenu pirisa babuze mene moni silva awiya yangtagairo pu dekaongna gairo eyero sewa, “Moni ewiya dao magayaora zuma, aeno ibu bainana awangna puganane oko teng yariniya.”
40027007	Asero awong moni amimene no yarinenine ayero sero wina-se nete sewa teng yenu moni awiya puro baungno au yao emora tawing agewa zo zuma gaewa ara. Emo esewa buro magayaya atu mutaya biriti esewara yaise sero zuma gaewa ara.
40027008	Arare tawing auna yazo “Yu Zuma Gayaora” ayero sewa tau yenu mitoiya ara.
40027009	Arare porofete Yeremiara ge me yena ara. Ge awiya eyao era, Isreli emo awong zuma nuna silva moni 30 ayero sewa ara.
40027010	Emo moni silva 30 amimene au yao emora tawing zuma gaewa ara. Tuwa mene na eno sena deka ayero yewa.
40027011	Awong Yesu puro bamuwa emo tuwara benaungna dopenu emo tuwa mene atata yero sena, “Ning Yuda emora emo tuwa ing?” Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Yore, sinesa ara.”
40027012	Ayero sena ara. Arata be pirisa babuzere simaire mene nung gera pugari sero ge sewa be aune nung ge abena oko sao yena.
40027013	Ayero yenu Pilato mene atata yero sena, “Ning eno ge mou-mesa yao sineya awiya nigitinesita?”
40027014	Ayero senu Yesu mene ge abena oko sao bora bora yero mitinu emo tuwa mene giro wawong di gauna ara.
40027015	Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna iya sero emo tuwa nung Yuda emo zo yazo yau sinauwa emo awiya bunao gare atu besero ayero nasani nauna.
40027016	Arare be auna atu gorobo emo meko nibamu zo bunao gare mitina yazo nuna Barabas.
40027017	Arare emo apakana augairo dodopinewa Pilato mene atata yero sena, “Emo zota zo besanese sinei? Na Barabas besanese sineita Yesu nung emo tuwa Kristo asineya, nung awiya besanese sinei?”
40027018	Pilato mene ayero sena, noeno okowata, Yesu mene buro nasani naunu emo bauno Yudara gitau yao emo yangdoro nuna-una bautunauwa aeno gitau yao emo mene nung eno tini kapao puro nung puro buro nuna-una newa, ayero gigina.
40027019	Be aune emo tuwa nung ge sao tau yao masi nuna-una adungno mitinu bauno nuna mene ge eyero pugainu baungna, “Ning emo dang auna ge osina zo oko sase. Noeno okowata, na yeme atiyo yero nung aeno yaya baina tapunete gigena.”
40027020	Arare pirisa babuzere simaire awong emo bauno dawong gaero eyero sewa, “Barabas ao-diro Yesu daese sepu.” Ayero sewa.
40027021	Arare emo tuwa mene nupema atata yero sena, “Zota zo besanese sinei?” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Barabas.”
40027022	Ayero sewa nung atata yero sena, “Ayero Yesu Sorao Emo Kristo ayero sinowa nung eno nono yarineni?” Ayero atata yenu be kerero zayero wawa sero eyero sewa, “Nung i pasaora magayaise.”
40027023	Ayero sewa Pilato mene nupema atata yero sena, “Noeno ayero sinei? Nung pasena no yeni?” Ayero senu awong atata auna susuwa oko sao yangdoro wawa sero eyero sewa, “I pasaora magayaise.”
40027024	Ayero sewa Pilato ge sero tetere yero giro winade bainakama kasa yoiye sero awang nasani senu soumani ou puro bumuwa nung Yuda emora benaungna atu wawong nuna sainasani eyero sena, “Emo pewayao ewiya dao magayao auna pasena awiya nana-una oko mitaise. Awiya nona ninae gege.”
40027025	Ayero senu awong be kerero wawa sero eyero sewa, “Dao magayao nuna auna pasena awiya nae aune saisibuna nanae auna-una mitaise.” Ayero sewa ara.
40027026	Ayero sewa Pilato mene senu Barabas besewa kasa yenu awong Yesu angsi wo tata mene yao amimene wezewa ara. Wezinete duwa aune Pilato mene Yesu i pasaora daya magayaise sero gorobo emora waweng pugaina ara.
40027027	Pilatora gorobo emo ena mene Yesu puro Roma emo tuwara gare witiro sewa gorobo emo apakana nuna-una augaiwa ara.
40027028	Augatinasani Yesura taung wori dutugairo taung wori yuyao wosogaiwa pungna. Awiya emo tuwara taung wori wosogaine yewa pungna.
40027029	Ayero yero angsi dungne puro ewero aune ziyo nuna-una atu wosogaiwa ara. Ayero yero itu zo pugaiwa wawong me mene puro dopena ara. Ayero dopero mitinu nuna-una nugu baungno boma gaero nung izinasani eyero sewa, “Iya iwaing, Yuda emora emo tuwa.”
40027030	Ayero sero begura pisinasani itu sorero puro nung ziye dewa ara.
40027031	Ayero nasani nung izinasani nete gorobo emora taung wori dutugairo yangdoro taung wori nuna awiya nupema wosogaiwa pungnu i pasaora dari sero puro bamuwa ara.
40027032	Puro bautunete nagibe atu emo zo tamuwa yazo nuna Simon, nung Sairini napora. Awong nung taungno ato sewa Yesura i pasao soreuno diunu bamuwa ara.
40027033	Bautunete tawing zo yazo Goligata, ge naname-una “Gitau Atora Wetu,” atu kasa yewa.
40027034	Kasa yero ou wain puro ou dokowang yao yaya nuwegaora ou aune dema dawero pugaya minaise pugaiwa miniro giro yangduna ara.
40027035	Ayero yero nung i pasaora dewa ara. Dero aune taung wori nuna itagi yero pumari sero ge tuwao zo yazo nuna laki awiya yewa ara. Ayero aune taung wori nuna bono yero pumuwa ara.
40027036	Ayero nung diya nasani adungno mitiwa ara.
40027037	Ika i pasao tame atu susuwa nouna nung dewi auna ge eyero gaero pugaiwa mitina, “Ewiya Yesu, Yuda emora emo tuwa.”
40027038	Emo ugaing mani etobe nung aune dema i pasaora dero zo enaba zo enaba ayero pugaiwa dopewato ara.
40027039	Masi auna atu emo puma-sauma nasani Yesu izero nung eno eyero sewa,
40027040	“Ae, ibu baina kasero wari be etama aune ibu seka yari sasa amimene taung aingso nina gera yaora atu sore. Ning Tuwa Bayaura mani me nosi siya, arare ning nika nitope i pasaora atu wosi dopase.”
40027041	Pirisa babuze aune sao tauyao ge gipao emore simaire awong deka ayero nung izinasani sewa,
40027042	“Nung gitau emo ena soreuno kora yero nasani nauna, arata nung nuka nutope soremao ine teng oko ara. Nung Isreli emora emo tuwa naname noita, aeno i pasaora atu yeme wosai nung Sorao Emo naname me ayero sarinenane.
40027043	Nune ‘Na Tuwa Bayaura Mani’ asinasani Tuwa Bayau tumo didinoiya, arare Tuwa Bayau mene nung aratapu nasani giro nung sorero pumaise ganene.”
40027044	Ayero sewa pasena emo etobe dema awongto Yesu deka ayero izewato ara.
40027045	Ayero nung eno newa wari diti 12 kilok yenu mume baina kasa yero tawing teng yero mitinu 3 kilok yena ara.
40027046	Arare 3 kilok yenu aune Yesu mene wawa sero eyero sena, “Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani.” Ge naname-una, “Tuwa Bayau nana, Tuwa Bayau nana, ning nono yero na dotinesi?”
40027047	Ayero senu dopero mitiwa auna ena mene nigiro eyero sewa, “Nung Eliya yau siniya.”
40027048	Aune zo mene nigiro mena sungno baungno witora yabutata zo puro wain dokowang yao dusero itura diro Yesu mene minaise sero pugainu witina ara.
40027049	Ayero yenu ena mene giro eyero sewa, “Ning yangdo. Eliya mene buro nung batagairo pugai wosarinita, awiya ganene.”
40027050	Ayero sinewa Yesu nung nupema wawa bainakama senu oweno aung yenu magayena ara.
40027051	Magayenu ibu bainana mo bainakama kimegao awiya ika atu zayero kerero dao etobe yena ara. Dumi bainakama ipenu daba babuze bebezegaiwa.
40027052	Ayero yenu biriti be gausenu ge emo gitau magayao ena mene seka yewa ara.
40027053	Ayero yewa ago Yesu nung nuka nutope gitau yero iropunu aune awong biriti nunae-una atu iropuro Yerusalem napo dang auna baungno emo bauno daigairo auna-una kasa yewa gigiwa ara.
40027054	Gorobo emora gitau yao aune gorobo emo nuna ena awong Yesu diya nasani dopero mitiwa amimene dumine nona enane dema kasa yena awiya giro awang yero sewa, “Emo ewiya kara meba Tuwa Bayaura Mani ara.”
40027055	Mani bauno daigairo Yesu Galilaya tawingna atu ago yero nasani sou buro nauwa amimene ake ina atu dopero tani awiya gosinasani mitiwa ara.
40027056	Nunae-una ena awiya Maria Madala napora, aune Maria yazo nung Yakoboto Yosefera ai, nupema Zebedira mani etobe auna ai dema.
40027057	Ture inu aune Arimatia napora emo waure zo yazo nuna Yosefe, nung Yesura ge nigitinasani nauna, amimene baungno kasa ye
40027058	Pilatora-una gairo Yesura taung aingso pumari senu nigina ara. Nigiro taung aingso pumaise gorobo emo eno senu yangduwa.
40027059	Yangduwa Yosefe mene taung aingso puro mo neyangyao sekawa zo imoko-kaungkaung mene ewero
40027060	puro baungno daba uma sekawa wamao biriti gerao nuka nuna auna atu Yesu pugairo daba bainakama zo dereme yenu baungno be gazenu yangdoro baungna ara.
40027061	Ayenu biriti auna bera atu Maria Madala napora nung yazoreto adungno mitiwato ara.
40027062	Fraide ture weno dung mume yenu Sarerera be zayewa be aune pirisa babuze Farisayore awong au dekaongna gairo Pilatora-una bamuwa ara.
40027063	Baungno eyero sewa, “Emo tuwa nanae, nae ge zo kotupunenane, awiya sanane. Ge iwao emo omimene nung seka nasani eyero sero nasani nauna, ‘Na magayero wari be etama aung yai aune seka yero iroparinena.’
40027064	Gitau nung seka nasani aune nuka nutope Sorao Emo Kristo ayero sero naunu meko yero nauna. Arata yeme awiya buro-mani nuna mene baungno taung aingso nuna ugaing puro tara yero aune, ‘Nung magayaora atu iropuro seka yetiya,’ ge asero name eno ge iwaya meko yore yariniya. Arare awong ayero yowi sero, ning ge sasa gorobo emo mene baungno diya yero baingtitinaya wari be etama aung yaise.”
40027065	Ayero sewa Pilato mene awong eno eyero sena, “Gorobo emo pugatinena. Arare niye puro baungno pugaipu umo yero baingtiti nasani mitae.”
40027066	Ayero senu awong gorobo emo aune dema baungno daba be gazao awiya angsi mene diwa. Ayero yero angsi osina besaya mitai gari sero angsi osina etobe awiya i saora mung mene dewa saneneungna ara. Ayero yero gorobo emo ena biriti diya yaese pugairo ayero yewa ara.
40028001	Sabat iya aung yenu Sande gora iya gatinenu Maria Madala napora nung yazo nuna auneto biriti gari sero bamuwato ara.
40028002	Bautunewato dumi bainakama ipenu Tuwara angelo zo mene uritira atu wosiro daba dereme enaba yenu baungnu nung tame adungno mitina ara.
40028003	Benaung nuna awiya zayang-zayang nasani waegatinena. Taung wori nuna imoko-kaungkaung awiya neyangyao, bereze ine ara.
40028004	Arare diya emo awong giro awang yero wetu ipenu zuwero mamagayao ine yero mitiwa ara.
40028005	Ayero mitiwa bauno etobe baungno kasa yewato angelo mene eyero sena, “Nito awang oko yaeto. Na gosinena. Nito Yesu i pasaora dao awiya gari sero butuneyato.
40028006	Arata nung etu oko mitiya. Nung gitau niye eno sena deka ayero iropumiya. Nito bungputo, masi nuna gaeto.
40028007	Diti moko ninato mene giro aune mena baungno buro-mani nuna eno eyero seputo: Yesu nung magayaora atu iropuro Galilaya tawingna gitau bautuniya. Arare niye baungno nung atu garineya. Ge kara sinena ara.”
40028008	Angelo mene ayero senu giro awongto awang yero biriti doro mena kapetegairo sungno bamuwato. Arata awongto yawa yawa bainakama dema yero buro-mani nuna eno bowi sari sero sumao gege sungno bamuwato ara.
40028009	Bautunewato Yesu mene nagibe atu awongto taungno eyero sena, “Gora iwaing.” Ayero senu awongto nuna-una nugu koing gairo te nuna iniwato ara.
40028010	Ayero yewato Yesu mene eyero sena, “Nito awang oko yaeto. Baungno otao mani nana sayato Galilaya tawingna baungno na garineya.” Ayero sena ara.
40028011	Bauno etobe bautunewato biriti diya nunae-una ena mene mena sungno baungno nape atu pirisa babuze eno ungwe didinasani tani kasa yena auna ungwe diro aung yewa.
40028012	Ayero sewa nigiro awong simaire dema augairo ge sero nigiro ayero aune gorobo emo eno moni witao pugatinasani eyero sewa,
40028013	“Niye eyero sepu, ‘Pingne auriti awinenane buro-mani nuna mene kasa yero aingso nuna ugaing puro babeya.’
40028014	Ge awiya emo tuwa mene nigiro niye eno nona zo yao eno awang oko yae. Nae nung zawagairo sanane nigariniya.”
40028015	Ayero sewa gorobo emo mene moni awiya puro ge sewa awiya dimuwa ara. Arare ge iwao ge awiya Yuda emora-una teng yena. Teng yero mitoiya mitiya.
40028016	Buro-mani 11 awong Galilaya tawingna diri zo gitau Yesu mene awong eno sena auna witiwa ara.
40028017	Witiro nung maze giro nuna-una baungno kokoing gaiwa ara. Dekaong dekaong mene dubo gagausewa ara.
40028018	Arare Yesu mene nunae-una nugu baungno eyero sinasani tugata yena, “Putoung baina uritira aune tawingna aune apakana na eno pugairo aung yao.
40028019	Arare niye tawing sero sero bautunasani emo bauno dubu sero ge tugata yaya nigiro awiso nana yae. Ayero nasani Mama, Mani aune Oweno auna yazora susupunasani ge ou suwepu pumae.
40028020	Wini ge sero gipero ayero nona amaze gipepu diungno aung yae. Sana nigipu. Na wari be giti niye aune dema nana tawingna be aung yariniya arauwa.”
41001001	Yesu Kristo Tuwa Bayaura Mani auna Bowi Iwaing eyero kasa yena era.
41001002	Porofete zo yazo nuna Yesaya mene bukura ge ewiya gaenu mitoiya era, Ewiya gipu! Na bowi sao emo nana iyengtarinena. Nung gitau yero nagibo nina kora yariniya.
41001003	Nung eu yanawira atu wawa sero eyero siniya, “Tuwara nagibo awiya kora yepu korosae.”
41001004	Yesaya mene ge ayero gaena deka ayero Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo amimene eu atu mitasani ge putoungne sinaunu nigiti nasani nauwa. Eyero sinauna, “Niye dubo darawa yero nao memeko ninae duwaya giro aune na niye ge ou suwarinena. Ayero yaya aune Tuwa Bayau mene pasena ninae disai aung yariniya.” Ayero sero nauna ara.
41001005	Yudaya tawingna emo bauno arita napo baina Yerusalem auna emo bauno apakana amimene nuna-una baungno pasena nunae keregati nauwa aune nung awong ou Yodan auna atu ge ou susu nauna arauwa.
41001006	Yohanena mo awiya wo kameli tumiza puro gaewa ara. Ipura geing nuna awiya wo aingso ara. Nung koware aune pika ou amaze mininauna.
41001007	Yohane mene Tuwa Bayaura ge eyero sinauna, “Na gitau nena, arata na putoung aung. Ora emo zo ago bariniya auna putoung bainakama. Nune na daigatiniya ara. Na utero te soga nuna-una angsi awiya besao ine teng oko ara.
41001008	Nane ge ou gege niye eno pugena pumeya, arata nune mene zo ge ou Owenone niye eno pugai pumarineya.” Ayero sinauna arauwa.
41001009	Ayero newa aune Yesu napo Nasarete Galilaya tawingna mitiya auna atu bunu Yohane mene nung ou Yodan auna atu ge ou suwena ara.
41001010	Ayero yenu Yesu oura atu wiwiti nenu uriti gausenu Oweno mene nuna-una towari sero ni audubo ine yero wowosinenu gigina.
41001011	Diti yero gosinenu ge zo eyero uritira atu wosina, “Ning mani nana. Ning yo dingya nana. Na ning giro yawa yawa nena.”
41001012	Ge wosinu Oweno mene nung puro eu baungna.
41001013	Eu baungno wari be 40 mitaunu Sanda mene nung etegari yena. Yesu eu wo somara atu nenu angelo mene nung kora yewa.
41001014	Emo ena mene Yohane puro bunao gare pugaiwa aune Yesu mene Tuwara Bowi Iwaing awiya sero sero yero baung Galilaya yena.
41001015	Galilaya baungno eyero sena, “Be kasa yetiya. Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna be kasa yetiya. Niye dubo darawa yero Bowi Iwaing nigipu me yae.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41001016	Yesu mene ou nazi Galilaya auna bage atu nete Simon meta nuna Anderea awongto wo buro nasani nauwato amimene moga oura papatinewato gigina ara.
41001017	Giro awongto eno eyero sena, “Nito bungputo, na ago yaeto. Na nito gipana emo bauno pumao emo yaeto.”
41001018	Ayero senu giro awongto moga nunato atu doro Yesura ame bamuwato ara.
41001019	Yesu mene nupema maingkoka bage-bage baungno menetatore etobe yazo nunato Yakoboto Yohane, awongto Zebedira mani, amimene wangna atu mitasani moga kora newato awiya gigina.
41001020	Giro yausenu awongto maung nunato Zebedi awisore wangna atu doro Yesu aune dema bamuwato arauwa.
41001021	Awong baung napo Kapaneam yewa. Atu newa oregaora be yazo nuna Sabat awiya kasa yenu giro nung Yuda emora yere ibu auna toiro awong eno ge tugata yena ara.
41001022	Nung ge tugata nenu awong ge nuna nigiro wawong di gapunewa ara. Awiya noeno okowata, nung gera susuwa mene ge diro baingtina, awiya sao tauyao ge gipao emo nunae gipinauwa awiya doro daigairo putoungne sena ara.
41001023	Ayero gipinenu emo zo iwae mene nuna una toiro mitina amimene yere ibu nunae-una atu kasa yena.
41001024	Kasa yero ge betero eyero sena, “Yesu Nasarete napora emo, ning no yari sero nanae-una butunesi? Ning nae sisigari sero butunesita nowa. Na susuwa nina gosinena. Ning Tuwa Bayaura mani wosewa zebao.”
41001025	Ayero sena ara, arata Yesu mene iwae tunero eyero sena, “Ning ge doro nung doro baung.”
41001026	Ayero senu giro iwae mene emo awiya denu angzi apunenu iwae be kerero aiyamama sero nung doro baungna ara.
41001027	Ayero yenu emo bauno mene giro wawong di gauno ge wina-se nasani atata yero sewa, “Ewiya noiye? Nung gipao ge seka zo gipiniya. Nung emo putoungne ine yero ge sinoi nona apakana ge nuna dipunowa. Iwae dema ge nuna dipunowa.”
41001028	Ayero sewa bowi nuna amimene baungno Galilaya tawingna teng yena ara.
41001029	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema ayero yero yere ibu doro Simonto Andereara-una gare toiwa Yakoboto Yohane awongto aune dema toiwato.
41001030	Simonna imeti mene yaya taung kokoni yao puro apegairo mitinu giro awong bowi nuna Yesu eno sewa ara.
41001031	Sewa giro Yesu mene nuna-una baungno wawong nuna ininu iropunu taung kokoni yao awiya aung yenu nung nona nunae sairo pugainu miniwa arauwa.
41001032	Ture itinenu awong emo bauno yayare aune emo bauno iwae puro nasani nauwa awong awiya puro nuna-una kasa yewa.
41001033	Ayero yewa napora emo bauno apakana amimene be towaora atu wina-mise yero towari sero yewa.
41001034	Yesu mene senu emo bauno daigairo yaya ewe-pape puro nasani nauwa amimene iwaing yewa. Iwae daigairo tunenu bamuwa. Iwae mene nung gosinauwa, arare nung awong ge sao awang senu awong ge sao ine teng oko yewa.
41001035	Pingne iya oko gaore nung iropuro garo doro soma zo emo bauno aung auna baungno isa sinenu
41001036	Simon aune emo ena nung aune dema nauwa amimene nung kau yero baungno,
41001037	taungno eyero sewa, “Emo bauno apakana ning kauneya.”
41001038	Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Napo babuze nugu miteya auna dema babarinenane. Atu baungno na Tuwa Bayaura ge awong eno sane. Noeno okowata, na buro awiya eno bumuwang.”
41001039	Ayero sero nung yere ibu nunae Galilaya tawingna mitauwa auna baungno Tuwa Bayaura ge tugata nasani iwae ena tuni nasani nauna arauwa.
41001040	Yesu tani ayero nenu emo zo bozo tauyaore mene Yesura-una buro boma gaero koing gairo eyero sena, “Ning putoung nina mitiya, arare ning na kora yari yero giro kora yasa iwaing yarinena.”
41001041	Ayero senu Yesu mene nung yo yenu giro nung kora yari sero wawong pugairo nung dingyero eyero sena, “Yore, na ayero yari kotupunena. Taung nina iwaing kasa yaise.”
41001042	Ayero sinenu bozo tauyao nuna mena soyewa taung nuna iwaing yena.
41001043	Ayero yenu Yesu mene nung mena babaise sero ge tauyao nung eno eyero sena,
41001044	“Tani ning eno yetena auna bowi awiya emo zo eno oko sase. Arata ning baung, taung nina awiya pirisa eno gipasa gae. Ayero nasani nona Mose mene Tuwa Bayau eno pugaese sena, awiya pugasa yaya nina aung yetiya auna susuwa giro baingtarineya.”
41001045	Ayero senu emo awiya garo doro baungna ara. Arata nung emo bauno daigairo aeno ge sinasani auna bowi awiya sero sero yena. Arare Yesu mene napo zota zora emo bauno auna ditira babao ine teng oko yenu giro nung soma emo bauno aung auna baungno mitaunu emo bauno euna aune ouna aune ayero nuna-una kasa yero nauwa arauwa.
41002001	Wari be ena aung yenu Yesu mene nupema tera baung Kapaneam yenu emo bauno mene Yesu kapete nuna gare gairo mitina awiya nigiwa.
41002002	Nigiro emo bauno daigairo mene nuna-una buro augaiwa garo mokore bautare apakana beburo aung yena ara. Ayero yewa nung Tuwa Bayaura ge awong eno sinasani mitinu
41002003	emo ena mene emo zo te wawong amao awiya puro bumuwa ara. Emo siwongpatige amimene emo awiya diungno puro bumuwa.
41002004	Arata emo bauno witao mitiwa, arare awong Yesura-una nugu babao ine teng oko yenu giro awong garo eno nung wese mitina atu be yero emo gogare awiya pugaiwa wosina.
41002005	Ayero yewa Yesu mene inao nunae giro mani yayare aeno eyero sena, “Mani nana, na pasena nina disinena.”
41002006	Ayero senu Yudara sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena mene eyero kotupunasani mitiwa,
41002007	“Emo emimene Tuwa Bayau mene yaine niya. Emo zo mene pasena disao ine teng oko. Awiya Tuwa Bayaura buro gege.”
41002008	Ayero kotupunewa giro Yesu mene awong kotupunewa awiya mena yetine yero giro awong eno eyero sena, “Niye nono yero ayero kotupunei?
41002009	Name emo yayare aeno, ‘Iropu, ang yase’ tebeba ayero sanane nung oko ang yao yariniya, awiya name meng garinenane. Noeno okowata, emo bauno mene ge naname gaya ge iwao yariniya. Arata name, ‘Na pasena nina disinena,’ tebeba ayero sarinenane, awiya name meng oko garinenane. Noeno okowata, emo bauno mene ge naname-una me awiya gao ine teng oko.
41002010	Arare na pasena disaora putoung puro tawingna etu nona, awiya gaese sero na ge ewiya dema nung eno sarinena,
41002011	Na ning eno eyero sinena: Iropu, awao masi gogare nina puro garo nina-una babase.”
41002012	Ayero senu nung iropuro awao masi gogare nuna puro emo baunona diti mokora atu garo doro baungna ara. Ayero yenu awong wawong di gauno Tuwa Bayau bowi yero eyero sewa, “Name tani eyao ine gitau oko gao.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
41002013	Yesu mene soma awiya doro ou nazira nugu nupema baungnu emo bauno apakana mene nuna-una kasa yewa ge tugata yena ara.
41002014	Atu nawe garo awiya doro bautunete emo zo yazo nuna Lewi, nung Alifayora mani, nung amimene takis pugaora gare atu adungno mitinu giro nung eno eyero sena, “Ning na ago ye.” Ayero senu giro nung iropuro nung ago yena arauwa.
41002015	Yesu mene Lewira-una gare baungno adungno nona mininasani mitinu takis pumao emo aune Yudara sao tauyao ge dao emo daigairo amimene Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema adungno mitiwa. Emo ayetugao daigairo amimene Yesura ame nasani nauwa.
41002016	Arare Farisayora sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena mene Yesu takis pumao emo aune Yudara sao tauyao ge dao emo aune dema nona mininasani mitina, awiya giro buro-mani nuna eno eyero sewa, “Nung nono yero takis pumao emore ge dao emo aune dema nona mininiye?”
41002017	Ayero sewa Yesu mene ge awiya nigiro awong eno eyero sena, “Emo yaya aung mene doktara-una oko bautunowa. Arata emo yayare mene gege doktara-una bautunowa. Na emo nao nunae pewayao asinowa awiya yausari oko bumuwang. Arata na emo pasena yao emo awiya yausari bumuwang.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41002018	Be aune Yohanena buro-mani aune Farisayo awong amimene nona minao semini nasani mitiwa. Arare emo ena mene buro Yesu atata yero sewa, “Susuwa noeno Yohanena buro-mani aune Farisayora buro-mani amimene nona seminineya buro-mani nina mene nona oko seminao yero nei?”
41002019	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Emo bauno ataora bonene nasani mitaya emo nung bauno atariniya amimene awong aune dema nariniya be aune nona seminaese saya nigarineita? Aung arauwa. Awong emo aune dema narineya be aune seminaese saya oko nigarineya.
41002020	Arata ago emo awiya iwo mene puro babaya aung yariniya be aune awong nona seminarineya. Deka ayao ine na eno yaya aune buro-mani nana mene nona seminarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41002021	Yesu mene eyero sena, “Name mo toto yangtagairo gayari sero mo be seka puro mo asora atu oko gainonane. Ayero yarinenane, awiya mo seka mene watimai mo aso awiya nupema kerai toto bainakama yariniya.
41002022	Nupema, name ou wain seka puro meme aingso matura oko sukupunonane. Ayero yarinenane, awiya ou wain mene daing yero titisero meme aingso misero pisai kerai ou wainne meme aingsore awiya gera yarinenane. Name ou wain seka puro meme aingso sekara sukupunonane.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41002023	Sabat iya be zore Yesu buro-mani nuna aune nagibe atu bautunete wuit buro zo buwagati nasani buro-mani nuna mene wuit me kowero miniwa.
41002024	Ayero yewa giro Farisayo mene nung eno eyero sewa, “Sao tauyao ge mene awong buro zo Sabat iya be aune yao awang siniya awiya neya, gosinesita?”
41002025	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno abena eyero sena, “Niye ungwe zo Dawidi aune emo ena nung aune dema nauwa, awong nona minao aung, meri apunasani mitiwa auna ungwe awiya niye oko nigao mene saine neya, awiya!
41002026	Abayata mene pirisa baina yero nasani nauna be aune Dawidi mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu auna toiro ame Tuwa Bayaura benaungna pugati nasani nauwa awiya minina. Ame awiya awong wosao mene minaese sao oko. Pirisa gege mene minaese sao ara. Arata Dawidi mene ame awiya puro dubu nuna eno pugainu miniwa Tuwa Bayau mene giginu meko oko yena.”
41002027	Ayero sero susuuno eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayau mene Sabat iya be amimene emo bauno soremaise pugaina. Arata emo bauno mene Sabat iya be awiya soremaese oko pugaina.
41002028	Arare na Emora Mani mene nona apakana auna Tuwa yero nona amimene Sabat iya be auna Tuwa dema yero nona.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41003001	Yesu mene yere ibura nupema toiro emo zo wawong amao atu mitinu tauna.
41003002	Emo bauno atu mitiwa amimene Yesu anuwing nasani “Nung emo yayare awiya Sabat iya be eune kora yarinita?” asero etuti nasani mitiwa. Awong Yesu gera pugari sero kotupu nasani newa,
41003003	arare Yesu mene emo wawong amao aeno eyero sena, “Era gapo.”
41003004	Ayero sero nung atu awong eno eyero sena, “Name tani iwaing Sabat bere yanane teng yarinita, tani meko yanane teng yariniye? Ora name emo bauno soremanane iwaing yaya teng yarinita, emo gera yanane magayaya teng yariniye?” Ayero sena, arata awong bora-bora yero mitiwa.
41003005	Ayewa nung diti-dati yero tini kapenu nupema kotumao meko nunae giro awong eno yo-aungno moko nuna zi sinenu giro emo aeno eyero sena, “Wawong iteti.” Ayero senu wawong itetinu wawong iwaing nupema yena.
41003006	Ayero yenu Farisayo mene ibu doro kasayero mena baungno Herodera Pati memba ena aune dema augairo Yesu daya magayaise auna nagibo tamari sero yewa arauwa.
41003007	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune baung ou nazira yewa ara. Galilaya emo bauno dubu bainakama mene nung aune dema bamuwa. Ayero yewa emo Yudaya tawingna aune
41003008	emo napo Yerusalemna aune emo Idumia tawingna aune emo ou Yodan enabara aune emo napo Tayato Saidonna amimene buro apakana Yesu mene nasani nauna auna ge nigiwa, arare awong witao amimene nuna-una bumuwa.
41003009	Ayero yewa nung buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Emo bauno ewezoware na patowi sero wang zo sosero kora yero nugu pugaipu mitae.”
41003010	Ayero sena, noeno okowata, gitau nung emo yayare daigairo awiya kora yenu giro emo bauno yayare apakana amimene nung dingyari sero wina-mise nasani mitiwa.
41003011	Arare emo bauno iwae nunae-una mitiwa amimene nung giro te nuna-una zuwero aiyamama sinasani eyero sinauwa, “Ning Tuwa Bayaura Mani.”
41003012	Ayero sinauwa Yesu mene ge tauyao iwae eno sinasani awong susuwa nuna emo ena eno keregao awang sinauna.
41003013	Yesu mene diri witiro emo ena ara taungno yausenu nuna-una bumuwa.
41003014	Nung awong yangtagairo kora yero emo 12 puro burora pugairo awong nung aune dema naese sena. Nung awong iyengtai Tuwa Bayaura ge saese,
41003015	o iwae tunaora putoung awiya pumaese sena ara.
41003016	Nung buro-mani 12 yangtagairo puna auna yazo nunae era: Nung yazo seka Simon eno pugairo Petoro asena ara.
41003017	Yakobo nung Zebedira mani aune meta nuna Yohane auna yazo seka Boanege asena ara. (Ge naname-una, “Bibiyara mani.”)
41003018	Anderea, Filip, Batolomiu, Matiu, Tomas, Yakobo nung Alifayora mani, Tadias, Simon Zelote,
41003019	Yudas Iskeriot nung Yesu keregairo iwora waweng pugao emo. Yesu mene buro-mani awiya burora pugairo aune nung doro baung nuna gare yena.
41003020	Emo bauno daigairo mene nupema Yesura-una bumuwa nung aune mani awiso nuna aune awong nona minaora be daigaiwa.
41003021	Ayewa giro dubu nuna ena mene ge awiya nigiro, “Nung dau yaine niya,” asero nung sorari bamuwa ara.
41003022	Yudara sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena mene Yerusalem atu wosiro buro eyero sinasani mitiwa, “Iwae yazo nuna Bielsebul amimene nuna-una toiro mitiya. Arare iwaera gitau yao amimene nung sorepunoi iwae tuninoiya.” Ayero sewa ara.
41003023	Arare Yesu mene emo bauno yausenu bumuwa ge pungyao ena awong eno eyero sena, “Sanda mene nono yero nutope tunariniye?
41003024	Napo dekaongka auna emo bauno mene gausero wina-de yarineya, napo awiya tauyao oko mitarineya.
41003025	Ora dubu zo gausero ge wina-se nasani iwo wina-ye yarineya, dubu awiya tauyao oko mitarineya.
41003026	Sanda mene nutope iwo nuna yero putoung nuna gausero nariniya, awiya nung tauyero mitao teng oko yariniya. Putoung nuna aung yariniya.
41003027	Name emo putoung bainane zora wau apakana pumari sero gitau emo awiya bunero aune nuna-una gare toiro wau nuna apakana pumarinenane ara.
41003028	Na memoko sana nigipu. Emo baunona pasena apakana arita Tuwa Bayau izao ge nunae awiya disao teng niya.
41003029	Arata zo nung Oweno izariniya emo auna pasena disao ine teng oko ara. Pasena nuna mitao gege mitariniya.”
41003030	Yesu ayero sena. Awiya noeno okowata, awong nung eno eyero sewa, “Iwae mene nuna-una toiro mitiya.”
41003031	Ai nuna aune metamani nuna awong buro garo bautara atu dopero mitasani Yesu nunae-una baise sewa.
41003032	Asewa emo bauno dubu baina Yesura-una nugu adungno mitiwa amimene nung eno eyero sewa, “Ai nina aune metamani nina amimene ning gari sero buro bautara atu dopero miteya.”
41003033	Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Ai nana metamani nana awiya nami i?”
41003034	Ayero sero nung emo bauno nuna-una nugu adungno mitiwa awiya gosinasani diti-dati yero eyero sena, “Emo bauno emimene ayamani nana aune metamani nana aune neya.
41003035	Emo bauno Tuwa Bayaura ge nigiro dipunowa amimene metamani numono aune ayamani nana neya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004001	Yesu nung ou nazira nupema baungno ge tugata nenu emo bauno daigairo nibamu amimene nuna-una kasa yewa. Ayewa giro nung senu wang isewa wosinu nung witiro adungno mitinu emo bauno diti bainane mene bage atu mitiwa.
41004002	Atu mitiwa nung awong eno ge eniya ena sinasani ge witao awong eno tugata nasani yena. Tugata nasani awong eno eyero sena,
41004003	“Sana nigipu. Emo zo mene nona we bure atu sesari baungna ara.
41004004	Baungno nona we sesinenu we ena nagibe atu wosiwa ni mamani mene taungno miniro aung yewa ara.
41004005	Ora we ena awiya tawing daba tame atu paka yero mitina auna atu wosiwa ara. Tawing awiya sori oko wiyai yao, arare we amimene mena koso yewa ara.
41004006	Tatai nunae deka ayero imokore oko bauna, arare wari mene witiro kokoni yenu irara yero magayero aung yewa ara.
41004007	Ora we ena awiya tawing iwe ena mitiwa auna atu wosiwa ara. We awiya iwere dema apakana teng-temo pusasa yero iropuro iwe mene nona awiya anenu me oko iyao yena ara.
41004008	Ora we ena awiya tawing me gawire auna wosiro iropuro zauno me witao iwa ara. We zora me 30 inu, we zora me 60 inu, we zora me 100 ina.”
41004009	Ayero sero sena, “Zo nung dawongne mene ge awiya nigaise.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004010	Emo bauno zanewa aune emo ena mene Yesu aune dema nauwa arita buro-mani nuna 12 awong amimene ge eniya sena auna susuwa gari sero nung atata yewa.
41004011	Atata yewa giro nung awong eno eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna ge pungyero mitoiya, auna susuwa awiya niye ena mene nigaese sao mitiya ara. Arata ena awiya susuwa nuna pungyero mitai ge eniya gege sana nigaese sero sinona.
41004012	Porofete Yesaya mene ge eyero gaena, Awong dubo kapete gairo nao sekara naya na Tuwa Bayau mene pasena nunae disoni sero, awong diti moko nunae mene gaese, arata oko giro baingtaese. Awong ungwe nigaese, arata ungwena susuwa oko nigiro baingtaese. Tuwa Bayau mene ayero sena, arare na ge eniya gege awong eno sinona.” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.
41004013	Yesu mene ayero sero awong eno eyero sena, “Niye ge eniya auna susuwa awiya oko gao neita? Arare niye nono yero ge eniya ena auna susuwa giro baingtarinei?
41004014	Susuwa nuna eyao era: Emo we urari sesinoiya amimene Bowi Iwaing auna ge we urinoiya.
41004015	Arata emo bauno enana dubo awiya nagibora tawing tauyao ine. Awong Bowi Iwaing nigitinowa Sanda mene mena buro Bowi Iwaing dawong nunae-una toitinoiya awiya sorinoiya.
41004016	Deka ayao ine emo bauno ena awong tawing gawi aung daba tame paka yero mitoiya ayao ine ara. Awong uritira ge nigiro mena puro yawa yawa nowa.
41004017	Arata awong tatai aung. Awong Tuwara nagibo awiya be maingkoka gege ago yero nema aune emo bauno mene uritira ge eno iwo awong eno yero nowa giro awong mena nagibo awiya dotinowa.
41004018	Emo bauno ena mene awong tawing iwe mekore ine ara. Awong amimene uritira ge nigitinowa,
41004019	arata awong tawingna nona eno kotung-katung nasani wau moni eno yawa yawa nasani nona apakana aeno dubo-dubo nasani nowa, arare tani ayao amimene uritira ge worinowa me oko kasa yao noiya.
41004020	Arata emo bauno ena mene zo tawing me gawire ine. Awong amimene uritira ge nigiro pu dube gairo me tapunowa — ena 30, ena 60, ena 100.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004021	Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Name damana gaero puro au wese apero pugati nonineta? Aung arauwa. Ora name damana awiya garo bautara pugati nonineta? Aung arauwa. Name damana gaero gerura atu ikogati nonane.
41004022	Nona pungyao apakana ago kasa daung yarineya. Nona angayao apakana ago kasa daung yariniya.
41004023	Zo nung dawongne mene ge ewiya nigaise.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004024	Nung awong eno eyero sena, “Ge nigitinowa awiya nigiro baingtipu. Niye nona emo bauno eno pugarineya teng Tuwa Bayao mene niye eno pugariniya. Nona aune nona enane kapetegariniya.
41004025	Tuwa Bayau mene emo zo ge me ena puro noiya aeno ge me bainakama pugariniya. Ora emo zo ge me maingkoka gege puro noiya auna ge me awiya Tuwa Bayau mene sorero pumariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004026	Yesu mene eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna susuwa awiya eyero mitiya: Emo zo mene nona we buro nuna-una urinoiya.
41004027	Nona we urero nung awiro-dutiro anema we mene kosonoi aune emo amimene we koso yaora susuwa oko giro baingtao noiya.
41004028	Tawing mene nung nutope gawi nona eno pugatinoiya. Gitau koso yero kasa yero aune me wuzi noiya. Ayero yero aune me titisinoiya ara.
41004029	Titisero sau itinoi aune emo amimene minaora be kasa yetiya asero giro emo ena iwi gegeru yaore nona pumaese sero bure pugatinoiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004030	Yesu mene eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna susuwa awiya pu nora gairo sarinenine? Name susuwa awiya keregari sero ge pungyao nora pugairo sanane teng yariniye?
41004031	Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna susuwa awiya i zo yazo nuna mastet asinonane auna me ine arauwa. Emo mene i me awiya bure atu urinowa. I me awiya tawingna i me apakana miteya auna wosao nunae ara.
41004032	Arata urinowa mena bairo nona we ena bure atu urinonane awiya apakana daigairo baina noiya. Ayero noi bowang nuna babuze kasa yero nowa ni mamani mene utung nuna-una buro bowangna atu uwang gapunowa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41004033	Yesu mene ge eniya witao sinasani Bowi Iwaing emo bauno eno sero nauna ara. Nigao nunae auna teng sinauna.
41004034	Nung ge eniya gege awong eno sero nauna. Arata buro-mani nuna nata nung aune dema mitima nauwa giro be aune nung ge auna susuwa awong eno keregairo nasani nauna arauwa.
41004035	Be aune ture inu Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Name ou nazi buwagairo enabara babanene.”
41004036	Ayero senu giro awong emo bauno dubu baina awiya doro Yesu wangna atu kayero mitinu giro nung puro bamuwa. Wang ena awong aune dema bamuwa.
41004037	Bautu newa bisi yanakana sunu kakawa mene wang nosari sero nena.
41004038	Be awiya Yesu nung wang age baungno ziyo guto zo pugairo apegairo auriti awinena. Arare awong nung uwero nung eno eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, name magayari sero nenane era, awiya ning gosinesita?”
41004039	Ayero sewa nung iropuro bisi gona yero kakawa eno eyero sena, “Ning aung ye. Bisi sero mitiung.” Ayero senu soma bisi binono denu
41004040	nung awong eno eyero sena, “Niye nono yero yo bainakama mininei? Niye inao aungta nowa?”
41004041	Ayero senu awong yangka sero eyero wina-se yewa, “Emo ewiya nono yao i? Nung sesi bisi oure dema ge nuna dipunei?” Ayero sewa arauwa.
41005001	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune awong ou nazi buwagairo enabara kasa yewa. Tawing awiya Gerasa emora tawing.
41005002	Yesu wangna atu witinu emo zo iwae nuna-una toiro mitauna amimene biritira atu buro Yesura-una kasa yena.
41005003	Emo awiya biritira daba umana atu mitasani nauna. Emo zo mene nung saniro bunaine yao teng oko. Angsi tauyao yazo nuna seni awiya dema teng oko yao ara.
41005004	Gitau emo mene te wawong nuna seni mene buninauwa, arata nung wawongna seni watipu naunu kasugatinaunu tera seni deka ayero dedunaunu kasugatinauna ara. Emo zo mene nung saniro isiyao ine teng oko amimene nauna.
41005005	Pingne iyare nung biritira atu nasani diri atu nasani wawa sinasani nuka nutope daba mene kapinasani nauna.
41005006	Nung amimene ake-ina atu mitete Yesu giro sungno buro Yesura-una atu zuwero koing gairo
41005007	yausero aiyamama sinasani eyero sena, “Yesu, ning Tuwa Bayau ika mitoiya auna Mani, amimene na eno no yari butunesi? Na Tuwa Bayaura ditira atu sinasani ning na oko dasese sinena.”
41005008	Emo amimene ayero sena, noeno okowata, Yesu nung eno mena eyero sena, “Iwae, ning emo ewiya doro baung.”
41005009	Arare Yesu mene nung atata yero sena, “Yazo nina aweni?” Ayero senu abena eyero sena, “Yazo nana Dubu Baina. Noeno okowata, nae dubu bainakama.”
41005010	Ayero sero ge betinasani Yesu eno eyero isa sena, “Iwae tunasa ake oko babae.”
41005011	Arare napo pu witao diri deungna atu nona kau nasani mitiwa giro
41005012	iwae mene Yesu eno yausero eyero sewa, “Nae tunasa pura-una towanene.”
41005013	Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene eyero sena, “Ayero yepu.” Ayero senu iwae mene emora-una atu kasa yero doro pura-una toiwa pu mene sungno kowara baungno ou nazira gugute gairo ou miniro mamaga yewa ara. Pu auna zare nunae awiya 2,000.
41005014	Pu diya yao emo amimene zanero baungno emo nape mitiwa aeno sero emo wo bogara mitiwa adema sewa giro awong tani kasa yena awiya gari sero bumuwa.
41005015	Awong Yesura-una buro emo gitau iwae witao nuna-una mitauwa nauna amimene mo awiro kotumao iwaing puro adungno mitina awiya giro awang yewa.
41005016	Emo ena tani emo auna-una atu kasa yenu gigiwa amimene ge ungwe awiya yewa. Nupema tani pura-una atu kasa yena awiya dema tugata yewa.
41005017	Ayero yewa emo bauno mene Yesu yausero tawing nunae ozaung doro babaise sewa ara.
41005018	Ayero sewa Yesu wangna wiwitinenu emo gitau iwae nuna-una mitiwa tunena amimene Yesu eno isa sero nung aune dema nari sena.
41005019	Arata Yesu mene “Aungwa” sero nung eno eyero sena, “Dubu nina-una baungno Tuwa mene ning ao-diro tani iwaing ning eno yetiya awiya se nigae.”
41005020	Ayero senu nung baungno tawing yazo Dekapolis (ge naname-una, “Napo wawong etobe”) auna kasa yero tani Yesu mene nung eno yena auna ungwe tugata-magata yero yenu emo bauno apakana be angyero ge nuna gege nigiti nasani nauwa.
41005021	Yesu wangna witiro ou nazi nupema buwagairo enabara kasa yero bage atu mitinu emo bauno daigairo mene nuna-una kasa yewa.
41005022	Kasa yero mitiwa yere ibura simai emo zo yazo nuna Yairo amimene Yesu giro nuna-una baungno koing gairo
41005023	isa sero eyero sena, “Mani baunodi nana maingkoka amimene magayari sero niya. Ning bung. Ning mani kora yari sero giro wawong nina nuna-una tame pugasa nung iwaing yero nariniya, awiya gosinena.”
41005024	Ayero senu Yesu mene nung aune dema baungna. Bautunenu emo bauno daigairo mene nung aune dema bautunasani nung pu towang gairo puro bautunewa.
41005025	Anewa bauno zo awong aune dema bautunena amimene yu pupunasani nawe dunu dawang 12 aung yenu yu pupunauna awiya oko soyao.
41005026	Nung dokta witao auna-una bautu naunu awong yaya nuna aung yaise buro yero nauwa, arata yaya nuna oko aung yao naunu nung yaya bainakama tapunasani nauna ara. Nung wau moni nuna apakana pugainu aung yena, arata yaya oko aung yao yena. Yaya bainakama kasa nasani nauna.
41005027	Arare nung amimene Yesura bowi nigiro emo bauno dubu baina awiya gate-gate yero Yesura-una bautara kasa yero
41005028	nutope eyero kotungna, “Na taung wori nuna ding yero iwaing yarinena.”
41005029	Ayero kotungno kasa yero Yesura mo ding yenu yu nuna mena soyenu Yesu mene nung kora yenu yaya aung yena awiya gigina.
41005030	Ayero yenu Yesu mene kora yaora putoung auna yatu nung doro baungna awiya yetine yero giro emo bauno dubu baina auna towang atu mena kapetegairo eyero sena, “Awe mene taung wori nana ding yetiye?”
41005031	Ayero senu buro-mani nuna mene nung eno eyero sewa, “Emo bauno dubu baina mene ning misineya, arare ning nono yero ‘Awe na ding yetiye?’ asinesi?”
41005032	Ayero sewa arata Yesu mene, “Awe mene na ding yetiye?” asero gari sero diti-dati yena.
41005033	Anenu bauno amimene tani Yesu mene nung eno yena awiya giro yangka sero awang nasani Yesura-una buro te nuna-una zuwero susuwa nuna keregairo sena ara.
41005034	Ayero yenu giro Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Aya nana, ning inao nina-una iwaing yetesa. Arare ning yawa yawa nasani aune baung. Yaya nina oko kapete gariniya.”
41005035	Yesu mene ayero sinasani mitinu emo ena mene simai emora-una gare atu buro eyero sewa, “Mani baunodi nina magatiya. Ning nono yero buro baina Gipao Emo eno pugari sinesi?”
41005036	Ayero sewa, arata Yesu mene ge sinewa awiya nigari sero dawong oko yawao yero yere ibura simai emo eno eyero sena, “Kotung-katung oko yase. Tumo diyaore gege neu.”
41005037	Ayero sero awong apakana nung aune dema babao awang sero Petoro aune Yakobo meta nuna Yohane ami gege nung aune dema babaese sena.
41005038	Awong baungno yere ibura simaira gare kasa yero Yesu mene emo bauno witao pasero zi sinasani mitiwa awiya gigina. Emo bauno zi sinasani zibe nasani mitiwa.
41005039	Ayero newa giro Yesu gare toiro awong eno eyero sena, “Niye noeno gurutu sero mitasani zi sinei? Mani awiya oko magayao. Nung auriti awiniya.”
41005040	Ayero senu awong nung pusugairo iwa. Arata nung awong awang senu garo doro bamuwa aune nung maina maung aire aune emo nung aune dema mitiwa awiya puro masi mani mitina auna toina.
41005041	Toiro maina wawong iniro nung eno Yuda gera eyero sena, “Talita kumi.” Ge auna susuwa eyao era: “Zebi, ning iropasese sinena.”
41005042	Ayero senu mani awiya mena iropuro angyena. Dawang nuna 12. Ayenu emo bauno mene wawong di gauno yangka sewa.
41005043	Yesu mene awong susuwa awiya emo bauno ena eno sowi sero ge tauyao sena. Ayero sero awong nona minao mani eno pugaese sena arauwa.
41006001	Yesu mene napo awiya doro napo nuna-una baungna. Buro-mani nuna mene nung aune dema bamuwa.
41006002	Arare Sabat be kasa yenu giro nung yere ibu mokora toiro ge tugata nenu emo bauno witao mene ge nuna nigiro wawong di gauno eyero sewa, “Emo kotumao awiya natu tamiye? Kotumao tauyao nono yao mene nuna-una kasa yetiye? Nung nono yero tani emo bauno gitau oko gao awiya yero noiye?
41006003	Emo ewiya nung kapenda. Nung Mariara mani arauwa. Nung Yakobo, Yosefe, Yuda, aune Simonna tato. Numono ai amono nuna name aune dema nowa.” Ayero sero awong Yesu eno kotumao meko puro dubo mou yewa.
41006004	Arata Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Porofete awong emo yazore. Arata napo nuka nunae-una, o dubu nuka nunae-una atu, o maung nuka nunae-una atu, awong emo yazo aung.” Ayero sena ara.
41006005	Nung tani emo bauno mene gitau oko gao nauwa awiya nunae-una atu yao teng oko yena. Arata nung wawong nuna mene emo yayare dekaong-dekaong auna-una pugainu yaya nunae aung yena ara.
41006006	“Awong nono yero na tumo oko diyao yero nei?” ayero kotungno giro nung angyero napo mamanikakara baungno ge tugata yena arauwa.
41006007	Yesu mene buro-mani nuna 12 yau senu bumuwa iwae tunaora putoung awiya awong eno pugairo awong eto-eto baungno tere-taira yero buro yaese sero nung awong eno eyero sena,
41006008	“Nagibora nona zo oko pumae. Wo ma aung, zao aung, wau moni aung. Tung gege pungpu.
41006009	Te soga wosogarineya, arata taung wori etobe oko wosogae.
41006010	Niye esewa yero napo zora baungno garo dekaongka auna toiro mitasani buro baungno nete napo awiya duwari yero giro aune garo awiya dopu.
41006011	Napo zo mene niye masi oko zuwao, o ge ninae oko nigao yaya giro napo awiya doro susuwa nunae gaese sero popo awetu nunae te yo ninae-una mitiya awiya dureregaipu wosae.”
41006012	Ayero senu giro buro-mani 12 amimene baungno emo bauno eno eyero sewa, “Niye dubo kapetegaipu.”
41006013	Ayero sero iwae witao tunero uweri emo bauno yayare witao auna-una yasagairo nauwa yaya nunae aung yero nauna arauwa.
41006014	Yesura bowi baungno emo bauno apakana tawing sero sero auna teng yena. Ayero yenu emo tuwa zo yazo nuna Herode amimene Yesura bowi nigina. Emo ena mene Yesu eno eyero sinauwa, “Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo nung amimene magayaora atu iropuna, arare nung tani putoungne yero noiya.”
41006015	Ena mene ayero sinauwa, arata ena mene eyero sinauwa, “Nung Eliya.” Ora ena mene eyero sinauwa, “Nung porofete zo. Porofete gitau nauwa ayao ine.” Ayero sinauwa arauwa.
41006016	Arata Herode mene Yesura tani auna ge nigiro eyero sena, “Na ge sewang awong Yohanena dubo kapewa magayena, arata nung nupema iropuro niya.”
41006017	Herode mene ayero sena, noeno okowata, gitau nung gorobo emo senu baungno Yohane bunero puro pu bunao gare gaiwa. Herode mene tani awiya bauno Herodia eno yena, auna susuwa awiya eyao era: Herode mene meta nuna Filipra bauno puro atina ara. Bauno auna yazo nuna Herodia.
41006018	Ayero yenu giro Yohane mene Herode eno eyero sena, “Ning meta nina-una bauno sorero puro aune dema nosa, awiya teng oko niya. Sao tauyao ge gazao mitiya.”
41006019	Yohane mene ayero senu giro bauno Herodia mene dung yero Herode nung Yohane daise sinauna.
41006020	Arata Herode mene tani awiya oko yao yena. Noeno okowata, nung Yohane awang yero nauna. Yohane nung emo pewayao, nung emo pasena aung, awiya giro awang yero sorero nauna ara. Yohane nung ge sinaunu Herode mene nigiro kotung-katung yero nauna, arata nung Yohanena ge nigari aratapunauna arauwa.
41006021	Arata Herodia mene Yohane dao magayaora be awiya tauna. Herode mene ai nung puna auna be awiya kasa yenu giro nung emo babuze nuna aune gorobo emora gitau yao ena aune Galilaya tawingna emo babuze ena awong aeno ana-bonene yena.
41006022	Be aune Herodia mene Yohane dao magayaora nagibo tauna. Awiya eyao era: Mani baunodi nuna mene Herodera ibu auna toiro na bainakama wuinu Herode ta esewa nung aune dema mitiwa amimene giro yawa yawa yewa. Ayero yewa giro Herode mene mani daungse aeno eyero sena, “Ning nona zota zo nomaze ara taungno sasa giro pugarinena.
41006023	Na Tuwa Bayaura benaungna sana tauyae. Ning nona no eno saisi — nona maingkokata nona bainakama — awiya saineba na ning eno pugarinena. Tawing nana agewa eno sarinesa, awiya pugarinena.”
41006024	Ayero senu nung doro baungno ai nuna eno eyero sena, “Na no pugaise sarineni?” Ayero senu ai nuna mene eyero sena, “Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo auna gitau ning eno pugaise sarinesa.”
41006025	Ayero senu nung mena sungno Herodera-una baungno eyero sena, “Yemeneka keune ning Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo auna gitau taora pugairo pugasa pumane.”
41006026	Ayero senu Herode mene kotunu teng oko yenu dubo nuna mou yena. Arata nung Tuwa Bayaura ditira atu ge senu tau yena, nupema emo dema mitiwa amimene ge nuna gaya wosao yao eno,
41006027	nung gorobo emo zo mene Yohanena gitau kapero puro baise senu baungno bunao gare atu dubo nuna kapero
41006028	gitau taora pugairo puro baungno mani baunodi aeno pugainu puro ai nuna eno pugaina ara.
41006029	Ayero yewa Yohanena buro-mani mene tani auna bowi nigiro giro baungno taung nuna puro baungno biritira atu mutewa arauwa.
41006030	Emo Yesu mene iyengtina amimene Yesura-una atu augairo ge tugata nasani buro yewa awiya apakana nung eno sewa ara.
41006031	Anasani mitiwa emo bauno witao mene Yesura-una buro baungno anasani newa Yesu aune buro-mani nuna aune nona minaora be aung yena. Ayero yenu giro Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Bungpu. Name nata baungno soma emo bauno aungna atu oreganene.”
41006032	Ayero sero awong wangna witiro soma emo bauno aung auna babari bautunewa
41006033	emo bauno witao napo sero sero auna mene awong bautunewa giro nai bage-bage gege gitau mena baungno kasa yero mitiwa ara.
41006034	Mitiwa Yesu wang doro witi ika yero emo dubu bainakama awiya giro awong eno yo auna. Noeno okowata, awong pu mamani mene ai kau nasani nowa ayao ine. Ayao giro yo auno nung awong eno ge tugata-magata nenu
41006035	ture itinenu giro buro-mani mene nuna-una nugu buro nung eno eyero sewa, “Soma ewiya soma meko. Nona minao aung. Ture itiniya,
41006036	arare ning emo bauno duwasa baungno nona minao nunae pumari napo nugu-nagu miteya auna babae.”
41006037	Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Ninae nona minao pugaipu minae.” Ayero senu awong nung eno eyero sewa, “Nae baungno ame igiyao 200 kina mene zuma gaero awong eno puganane minaese sinesa?”
41006038	Ayero sewa nung awong eno eyero sena, “Ame igiyao niye nazigo i? Baungpu gae.” Ayero senu awong baungno giro nupema buro eyero sewa, “Ame wawong zore wo etobere gege miteya.”
41006039	Ayero sewa nung emo bauno eno eyero sena, “Niye dubu sero dopero kanasi nezayao owiya naero adungpu.”
41006040	Ayero senu awong dubu sero adumuwa — dubu ena emo bauno 100, dubu ena emo bauno 50, ayero yero adumuwa ara.
41006041	Ayero yewa aune Yesu mene ame wawong zore wo etobe awiya puro ditiye uritira gairo Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero ame awiya eegairo buro-mani eno pugaina ara. Awiya buro-mani mene emo bauno eno pugaese sero ayero yena ara. Nung wo etobe puro zozoro gairo bono yenu emo bauno apakana amimene pumuwa.
41006042	Awong apakana miniwa teng yena ara.
41006043	Teng yenu awong ame itoto wo itoto awiya yangtagairo puro saka 12 auna gaiwa teng yena.
41006044	Emo nona miniwa auna zare nunae awiya 5,000.
41006045	Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Niye wangna witiro musugairo enaba Besaida nape gitau babarineya. Na emo bauno zanaese sero aune awong duwarinena.”
41006046	Ayero sero nung awong gitau iyengtinu bamuwa nung isa sari sero diri witina ara.
41006047	Atu isa sinasani mitinu ture itinenu mani awiso wangna bautunete ou nazi towang daung yewa ara.
41006048	Atu bisi mene awong dero ibena abena nenu awong wang dawaora yaya tapunewa awiya gigina. Ayero giro iya gari nenu aune nung ou nazi tame angyero nunae-una nugu kasa yena. Nung awong daigari sero nenu
41006049	awong nung ou tame angnena awiya giro nung ititi zota asero aiyamama sewa.
41006050	Awiya noeno okowata, awong nung giro awang yero te wawong ipena. Ayero yewa giro nung awong eno mena eyero sena, “Niye tau yepu. Na ara. Awang oko yae.”
41006051	Ayero sero nung wangna witinu soma bisi sena. Ayero yenu awong yangka sewa ara.
41006052	Awiya noeno okowata, awong tani Yesu mene ame emo bauno eno pugaina auna susuwa oko gao. Diti dubore nunae oko zawagao.
41006053	Awong ou nazi buwagairo baung tawing yazo Genesaret auna yero wang isewa witina ara.
41006054	Ayero yero wang doro witiwa emo bauno Yesu gao amimene nung giro
41006055	napo nugu-nagu mitiwa auna sungno baungno emo bauno kezeya yetugao goga gaero zuwagairo puro buro Yesu atu mitiya asero atu pugaiwa ara.
41006056	Soma apakana Yesu mene baungna — napo mamanikaka, o napo babuze, o soma napo aung — soma auna emo bauno mene emo bauno kezeya yetugao puro nagibe pugaiwa emo bauno yayare mene Yesu yausero mo be nuna gege ding yari sewa. Emo bauno ding yewa auna yaya aung yena.
41007001	Farisayo ena aune sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena Yerusalem atu bumuwa amimene Yesura-una augaiwa.
41007002	Augairo buro-mani nuna mene wawong oko sayao nona mininewa awiya gigiwa.
41007003	Wawong sayaora tani auna susuwa eyao era: Farisayo emo gege okowata, Yuda emo apakana dema, awong nona teba oko mininowa. Awong ewowo nunae-una sao tauyao ge awiya ago yero wawong saero aune nona mininowa ara.
41007004	Awong maketra atu nema kapetegairo gare buro gitau ou suwero aune ago nona mininowa. Awong ewowora sao tauyao ge ewe-pape ago nasani awangne taore aure sainowa.
41007005	Arare Farisayo aune sao tauyao ge gipao emo amimene Yesu eyero atata yero sewa, “Buro-mani nina mene nono yero ewowora sao tauyao ge awiya doro wawong oko sayao nona tebeba mininei?”
41007006	Ayero sewa nung awong eno eyero sena, “Niye ge iwao emo me sao yero nowa. Ge porofete Yesaya mene gaena amimene niye gapuniya. Ge gaena awiya eyero mitiya era: Tuwa mene eyero siniya, Emo bauno emimene na begiti mene bowi yero nowa, arata moko nunae nana-una oko mitiya.
41007007	Awong emora ge awiya Tuwa Bayaura sao tauyao ge ine ayero sero gipero ayero nowa. Arare awong na bowi yari yero tetere yero nowa. Yesaya mene ayero gaena ara.”
41007008	Yesu mene ayero sero aune ge susuuno eyero sena, “Niye Tuwa Bayaura sao tauyao ge doro emora wini ge puro iniro baingtitinowa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41007009	Yesu mene ge zo nupema awong eno eyero sena, “Niye Tuwa Bayaura sao tauyao ge doro ewowora tani ago yero nowa, awiya kotupunowa iwaing noi?
41007010	Na ayero sinena, noeno okowata, Mose mene eyero sena, Ning tani iwaing ai maung nina eno nasani neu. Nupema, Zo nung ai maung nuna eno ge meko sariniya, nung awiya depu magayae.
41007011	Mose mene ayero sena, arata niye eyero sinowa: Zo nung ai maung nuna eno eyero sai teng yariniya, ‘Na nona nito eno pugatena, arata na nona awiya mena Koban eno sewang.’ (Koban auna susuwa eyao era: “Na nona ewiya Tuwa Bayau eno pugari sewang tauyena.”)
41007012	Mani zo ayero sariniya, awiya niye nung ai maung soremoiye sero awang sinowa.
41007013	Ayero yero niye Tuwa Bayaura sao tauyao ge pu ago gairo ewowora tani pu gitau gairo mani eno gipinowa. Tani ayao awiya daigairo yero nowa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41007014	Yesu mene ayero sero emo bauno nupema yausenu bumuwa eyero sena, “Ge sana nigipu. Niye apakana nigiro baingtipu.
41007015	Nona be ninae-una toitinoiya amimene oko niye noi beingtire yero nowa. Ge be ninae-una atu kasa noiya amimene niye noi beingtire yero nowa ara.
41007016	[Zo nung dawongne mene ge ewiya nigaise.]” Ayero sena arauwa.
41007017	Ayero sero emo bauno doro buro-maine dema gare toiro buro-mani mene ge sena auna susuwa nigari sero nung atata yewa ara.
41007018	Atata yewa giro nung awong eno eyero sena, “Ayero niye dema oko gao yero neita? Niye susuwa ewiya gosineita? Nona minao mene bera toiro niye oko noi beingtire yero nowa.
41007019	Noeno okowata, nona minao amimene dubo ninae-una oko toitinoiya. Nona awiya tini ninae-una baungno nagibo nuna-una wowosinoiya.” Yesu mene ge awiya sinasani nona minao apakana amimene dubora beingti oko tapunoiya. Ayero sena ara.
41007020	Ayero sero aune eyero sena, “Tani emora-una dubora atu kasa yero noiya amimene emo awiya noi beingtire yero noiya.
41007021	Noeno okowata, emora-una mokora atu, o emora-una dubora atu kotumao meko mene kasa yero nowa — kuma yao, ugaing yao, mani dao magayao, atao gerayao,
41007022	dubo-dubo yao, tani meko yao, ge iwao ge sao, gao meko yao, isi patao ge sao, taung puro witao, wini ge dero nao —
41007023	tani awiya apakana emora-una mokora atu kasa yero emo awiya yero noi beingtire yero noiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41007024	Yesu mene atu iropuro baung tawing zora atu napo zo yazo nuna Taya mitauna auna yero garo zora toiro mitasani emo bauno mene nung atu mitina awiya gowi sero awang sena, arata nung nutope pungyaine yao teng oko.
41007025	Ayero nenu bauno zo mene Yesura bowi nigina. Bauno auna mani bauno di zo maingkoka amimene iwae nuna-una mokora mitauna ara. Bauno amimene kasa ye Yesura-una gairo koing gaina.
41007026	Arata bauno awiya nung Yuda oko. Tawing nuna yazo Sirofonisia. Arare nung Yesu eno isa sero nung mani nuna-una iwae tunaise senu
41007027	Yesu mene nung eno ge eniya zo eyero sena, “Na nona mani mamani eno gitau pugana minaya teng yae. Noeno okowata, mani mamanina nona minao sorero sino unao ine awiya teng oko yariniya.”
41007028	Ayero senu giro bauno mene ge eniya auna abena eyero sena, “Tuwa, awiya meba sinesa. Arata sino opesa wese atu mitasani susuna mani mene nowa wowosinoiya awiya mininowa.”
41007029	Ayero senu giro Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ge iwaing sesesa, arare gare baung. Iwae mene mani nina mena doro babiya.” Ayero sena ara.
41007030	Ayero senu bauno mene nupema tera kapete nuna-una gare gairo baungno iwae mena baungnu mani nuna teba apegairo mitina awiya gigina.
41007031	Yesu mene atu iropuro tawing napo Taya mitina awiya doro napo Saidon buwagairo tawing yazo Dekapolis awiya buwagairo kasa ye ou nazi zo yazo Galilaya auna gaina.
41007032	Ayero mitinu emo ena mene emo zo puro buro Yesura-una yewa ara. Emo awiya dawong itigao, ge aung. Emo mene emo awiya puro Yesu mene nung ding yero kora yaise sero isa sewa.
41007033	Ayero yewa giro Yesu mene emo awiya puro emo bauno doro baungno dopero wawong soro emo auna-una daweng pugairo begura pisero wawong mene emo auna ewawa dingyero
41007034	diti ika uritira yero oweno tauyao pisero emo aeno eyero sena, “Epata.” (Ge naname-una, “Dawong iwaise.”)
41007035	Ayero senu dawong tangsenu be eo yenu ge iwaing sena ara.
41007036	Ayero yenu giro Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye tani euna bowi sowi sero awang sinena.” Ayero sinaunata emo bauno mene gewera yero keregairo nauwa.
41007037	Anauwa emo bauno ena mene nigiro wawong di gauno yangka sero eyero sinauwa, “Nung tani apakana iwaing yero noiya. Nung noi emo dawong itigao mene ge nupema nigitinowa, nupema emo ge aung amimene ge nupema sinowa.” Ayero sinauwa arauwa.
41008001	Iya zore emo bauno daigairo mene Yesu aune augairo mitete nona minao aung yenu mitiwa giro nung buro-mani nuna yau senu bumuwa eyero sena,
41008002	“Na emo bauno yo niya. Noeno okowata, awong iya etama na aune dema nete doteya nona minao awena aung yetiya.
41008003	Arare na nona awong eno oko pugao tebeba iyengtarinena, awiya awong bautunete nagibe atu meri magayero zuwarineya. Awong ena soma nugu daung okora atu bumeya.”
41008004	Ayero senu buro-mani mene nung eno eyero sewa, “Name towangna etu nono yero emo baunona nona minao taungno pugarinenine?”
41008005	Ayero sewa giro eyero sena, “Niye ame igiyao nazigo i?” Ayero senu giro awong sewa, “Nae ame igiyao 7.” Ayero sewa ara.
41008006	Arare Yesu mene emo bauno tawingna adumaese senu adumuwa nung ame igiyao 7 awiya puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero ame awiya eegairo buro-mani eno pugaina. Buro-mani mene emo bauno eno bono yaya minaese sero pugainu puro emo bauno eno bono yewa.
41008007	Nupema wo mamanikaka nunae ena mitiwa awiya puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero buro-mani eno eyero sena, “Wo dema emo bauno eno bono yepu.” Ayero sena ara.
41008008	Ayero senu puro bono yewa miniwa teng yena. Teng yenu giro itoto pu dekaongna gaiwa saka 7 teng yena ara.
41008009	Nona miniwa awong auna zare nunae awiya 4,000.
41008010	Miniwa aune Yesu mene awong senu bamuwa. Bamuwa nung buro-mani nuna aune wangna witiro tawing yazo Dalimanuta auna bamuwa arauwa.
41008011	Farisayo ena mene Yesura-una buro nung aune dema ge wina-se yewa ara. Awong Yesu gaero gari sero nung tani diti seka zo yai uritira putoung kasa daung yai gari sewa ara.
41008012	Sewa Yesu mene ge nunae giginu bereya yenu giro eyero sena, “Emo yeme neya emimene noeno tani diti seka zo gari sinei? Na ge meba nibamu sinena era. Emo yeme neya emimene tani diti sekawa zo oko garineya.” Ayero sena ara.
41008013	Ayero sero nung awong doro wangna nupema witiro ou nazi enabara baungna arauwa.
41008014	Buro-mani nuna mene ame oko pumao nuwegaiwa. Ame dekaongka gege awong aune dema wangna mitina.
41008015	Arare Yesu mene dawong gayao ge zo awong eno sinasani eyero sena, “Niye umo yepu. Farisayora yis ta Herodera yis amimene seung ninae-una goiye sero niye umo yero baingtiti nasani neupu.” Ayero sena ara.
41008016	Ayero senu awong ge nuna awiya nigiro wina-se yewa, “Name ame nuwegenane aeno ge ewiya sinita nowa?”
41008017	Ayero sewa awong Farisayora gipao ge okowata, ame minao maze kotupunewa giro Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Name ame dotenane aeno siniya awiya noeno sinei? Niye yeme susuwa nana oko gosineita nowa? Diti dubore ninae daba ine i?
41008018	Niye diti mokore, arata niye oko gao i? Niye dawongne, arata niye oko nigao i? Niye susuwa ewiya nuwegeita nowa?
41008019	Na emo 5,000 eno ame wawong zo eegaiwang be aune niye itoto saka nazigo diwi?” Ayero senu awong sewa, “Saka 12 diwangne.”
41008020	Ayero sewa giro nung eyero sena, “Na emo 4,000 eno ame 7 eegena niye itotora saka nazigo diyei?” Ayero senu sewa, “Saka 7 diyenane.”
41008021	Ayero sewa giro nung eyero sena, “Niye tani awiya oko gao i?” Ayero sena arauwa.
41008022	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema kasa ye napo Besaida auna yewa emo ena mene emo diti guma yao zo puro Yesura-una buro Yesu mene nung ding yaise sewa ara.
41008023	Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene emo diti guma yao awiya wawong gaero puro napo doro baungno begura ye diti mokora gairo wawong diti mokora pugairo atata yero sena, “Nona zo gosinesita?”
41008024	Ayero senu nung diti kanero abena eyero sena, “Na emo bauno gosinena. Na awong gosinena i ipu ine neya, arata awong ang neya.”
41008025	Ayero senu giro Yesu mene wawong nuna diti mokora nupema pugainu emo awiya anuwing nenu diti nuna iwaing yenu nung nona apakana giro baingtina ara.
41008026	Ayero yenu giro Yesu mene nung iyengtari sero eyero sena, “Ning nupema napo euna oko babase. Ning garo nina-una baung.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41008027	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema napo ena tawing yazo Sisaria-Filipai auna mitiwa auna bamuwa. Bautunete Yesu mene buro-mani atata yero sena, “Emo bauno mene na awe sero nei?”
41008028	Ayero senu abena sewa, “Ena mene eyero sineya: Ning Yohane ge ou zayero suwao emo. Arata ena mene eyero sineya: Ning Eliya. Arata ena mene eyero sineya: Ning porofete gitau nawe magayewa auna zo.”
41008029	Ayero sewa giro nung awong atata yero sena, “Ora niye nika niyetope na awe sero nei?” Ayero senu Petoro mene eyero sena, “Ning Kristo, Sorao Emo nanae.”
41008030	Ayero senu Yesu awong eno ge tauyao eyero sena, “Ge nana awiya emo zo eno oko sae.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41008031	Yesu mene awong ge tugata yari sero eyero sena, “Na Emora Mani mene yaya-biyaya tamarinena. Yuda emora simaita pirisa babuzeta sao tauyao ge gipao emo amimene na awang sero na daya magayarinena. Magayana be etama aung yai aune na nupema seka yero iroparinena.”
41008032	Ge awiya senu kasa yenu gigiwa. Asenu Petoro mene nung yuno baungno awang sero eyero sena, “Ayero oko sase.”
41008033	Ayero senu Yesu mene kapetegairo buro-mani nuna ena giro abena Petoro gona yero eyero sena, “Sanda, ning na doro daigai. Ning ge sinesa awiya Tuwa Bayaura ge okowata, emora ge niya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41008034	Yesu mene buro-mani nuna aune emo bauno dubu baina aune awiya yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Zo nung na ago yari yero giro aratamao nuna apakana doro dubo minaore yaya tamaore auna i pasao nuna diungno na ago yaise.
41008035	Noeno okowata, zo nung tawingna nao nuna sorero puro nari kotumariniya auna nao nuna aung yariniya. Arata zo nung na eno yero o Bowi Iwaing nana eno yero tawingna nao nuna duwariniya amimene nao iwaing tamariniya.
41008036	Zo nung tawingna nona iwaing apakana awiya pupunariniya, arata nao nuna aung yariniya, awiya nona nomi nuna-una mitariniye?
41008037	Nupema nao nuna kapetegaise kotungno zuma noma pugai aune nao nuna awiya abena kapete nuna-una gariniye? Aung arauwa.
41008038	Emo pasena nasani Tuwa Bayau daigati nasani nowa be aune emo zo mene na ta ge nana awiya awang sariniya, awiya na Emora Mani mene Mama nana-una waegaore angelo pewa yetugaore bumarinena be aune na abena emo awiya awang sarinena.” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.
41009001	Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo ena etu dopero miteya amimene oko magayao naya Tuwa Bayau nata tuwa yero nariniya auna putoung kasa daung yai garineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41009002	Wari be 6 aung yenu aune Yesu mene Petoro Yakobo aune Yohane awong awiya gege puro diri bainana witiwa Yesura taung mene diti moko nunae-una atu darawa yero benaung zo ewe yena ara.
41009003	Mo nuna mene waegairo neyang yena. Mo nuna awiya neyang kaing-kaing yao. Emo zo mene mo sayai ayao ine yao teng oko.
41009004	Buro-mani nuna mene Eliyato Mose awongto Yesu aune dema ge sinasani mitiwato awiya gigiwa.
41009005	Giro Petoro mene Yesu eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, name etu mitenane awiya iwaing. Arare ning nigasa nae kouboga etama sinarinenane — zo nina, zo Mosera, zo Eliyara.”
41009006	Petoro mene no saine nete giro ge awiya sena. Noeno okowata, awong buro-mani mene awang bainakama yewa.
41009007	Ayero newa bereze zo mene buro awong worena. Ayero yenu ge zo bereze auna mokora atu eyero kasa yenu nigiwa, “Awiya mani nana. Nung yo diyang nana. Ge nuna nigipu.”
41009008	Buro-mani mene ge awiya nigiro gari-gari yero emo zo oko gigiwa, arata Yesu gege mene awong aune dema mitina awiya gigiwa.
41009009	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune dema diri atu wosiro bautunasani nung awong eno ge tauyao sinasani eyero sena, “Niye tani gigeya auna ge oko sae. Na Emora Mani mene magayero iropana aune niye ge awiya saya teng yariniya.” Ayero sena ara.
41009010	Arare awong Yesura ge tauyao sena awiya dimuwa. Arata awong Yesu magayero iropariniya auna gera susuwa gari sero kotung-katung yewa.
41009011	Ayero nasani nung atata yero sewa, “Sao tauyao ge gipao emo mene eyero sinowa, ‘Eliya gitau bai aune Kristo bariniya.’ Nono yero ayero sinowi?”
41009012	Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Eliya nung gitau buro tawingna nao meko awiya apakana korayai aune Kristo bariniya. Na Emora Mani eno ge eyero gaewa mitoiya, Nung yaya-biyaya tamariniya. Awong nung pusugairo gero iyarineya. Ge ayero gaewa mitoiya. Arata Eliya mene buro tawingna nao meko apakana kora yati siya, awiya tani nana-una atu kasa yariniya auna ge oko gayateya.
41009013	Aeno na niye eno sinena era. Eliya buna. Bunu giro emo ena mene nung eno tani tebe-tabe yewa. Ge nung eno gaewa ayao ine teng yewa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41009014	Awong wosiro buro kasa ye buro-mani enana-una yero emo bauno dubu baina mene buro-mani nuna ena aune dema mitiwa gigiwa. Sao tauyao ge gipao emo ena mene buro-mani aune ge betinasani mitiwa.
41009015	Ayero newa emo bauno mene Yesu butunenu giro yangka sero sungno baungno arugaiwa ara.
41009016	Ayero yewa Yesu mene awong atata yero sena, “Niye ge nomaze awong aune dema sinei?”
41009017	Ayero senu emo bauno dubu baina mitiwa auna emo zo mene nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, na mani emodi nana puro nina-una bumena. Noeno okowata, iwae nuna-una toiro mitoi nung ge aung mitoiya.
41009018	Mani nana be ena iwae mene nung darapunoi zuwero begura suwero di yetinoi taung aingso nuna tau-tataware noiya. Arare na buro-mani nina mene iwae tunaese sesena, arata awong tunao ine teng oko yeteya.” Ayero sena ara.
41009019	Ayero senu Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “O niye emo bauno inao aung. Na be nazigo niye aune dema narineni? Na be nazigo buro ninae eno taung dedunasani nari neni? Mani puro nana-una bungpu.”
41009020	Ayero senu awong mani puro nuna-una bumuwa iwae mene Yesu giro mani daraunu zuwero begura gutinasani angzi apunenu
41009021	Yesu mene maina maung atata yero sena, “Dawang noune yaya ewiya tauni?” Ayero senu abena eyero sena, “Nung mani maingkore tauna.
41009022	Arare iwae mene mani magayaise sero nung darapunoi oura ta iyaora zuwero noiya arauwa. Arata ning yaya kora yao ine teng yariniya, awiya ning nae eno yo auno nae soreung.”
41009023	Ayero senu giro Yesu mene bera puro eyero sena, “Na yaya awiya kora yao ine teng yarinita, asinesita? Emo zo nung tumo diyaore amimene tani apakana yai teng yariniya.”
41009024	Ayero senu maina maung mene mena eyero sena, “Na ning tumo didinona, arata ning na soremasa na ning tumo diro baingtane.” Ayero sena ara.
41009025	Arare Yesu mene emo bauno witao nuna-una suno butunewa giro nung iwae tunero eyero sena, “Ning iwae ge aung nao, o dawong itigao, na ning eno ge tauyao sinena era. Ning mani doro nuna-una nupema oko towase.” Ayero sena ara.
41009026	Ayero senu iwae mene be kerero mani awiya tau-tataware yao denu angzi apunenu iwae nung dunu mani awiya magayaine yena. Ayero yenu emo bauno witao mene giro eyero sewa, “Mani magayetiya.” Ayero sewa,
41009027	arata Yesu mene maina wawong iniro ininu iropuna ara.
41009028	Yesu buro-maine dema gare toiro buro-mani mene emo baunona diti pungyero aune nung atata yero sewa, “Nae iwae awiya tunari yetenane nono yero teng oko yao yetiye?”
41009029	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Name iwae ayao awiya tunari sero isa saora buro gege yero tuninonane. Iwae tunaora nagibo zo oko mitiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41009030	Awong atu iropuro baungno tawing yazo Galilaya awiya buwagaiwa. Arata Yesu mene awong bautu newa awiya emo bauno mene gao awang sena.
41009031	Noeno okowata, nung buro-mani nuna gipinasani eyero sena, “Awong na Emora Mani awiya puro emo enana-una waweng pugaya na daya magayarinena. Magayero wari be etama aung yai aune iroparinena.” Ayero sena ara.
41009032	Arata awong ge nuna-una susuwa oko gigiwa. Nupema awong nung atata yao awang yewa arauwa.
41009033	Awong bautunete baung Kapaneam yero gare toiro mitiwa aune Yesu mene awong atata yero sena, “Niye nagibe atu ge nono sesei?”
41009034	Yesu mene ayero atata yena, arata awong ge abena oko sao yewa. Noeno okowata, awong nagibe atu eyero sewa, “Naname-una zo awe mene baina niye?” Ayero sewa ara.
41009035	Arare Yesu mene adungno buro-mani nuna 12 yau senu bumuwa eyero sena, “Emo zo mene gitau yari sariniya, nung amimene ago yaise. Nung emo apakana auna sou yaise.”
41009036	Ayero sero aune nung mani maingkoka zo puro pu towang gairo mani saniro awong eno eyero sena,
41009037	“Emo zo mene mani zo eyao ine na eno kora yariniya, nung amimene na kora yetiya ayero yariniya. Emo zo na kora yariniya amimene na gege okowata, nung na iyengtinu wosiwang awiya dema kora yetiya ayero yariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41009038	Yohane mene nung eno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, nae emo zo nae aune dema oko nao amimene yazo nina yau sinasani iwae tuninenu gigiwangne. Arata nung nae oko ago yao noiya, arare duwaise sewangne.”
41009039	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Buro duwaise awiya oko sae. Noeno okowata, emo zo mene yazo nana yau sinasani tani putoungne zo yariniya amimene mena yazo nana puro wosari yai teng oko yariniya.
41009040	Emo iwo name eno oko yariniya awiya otao naname arauwa.
41009041	Na ge me niye eno sinena era. Emo zo mene niye Kristora mani yero nowa awiya giro ou minao niye eno pugariniya amimene abena zuma nuna iwaing pumariniya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
41009042	Yesu mene eyero sena, “Zo nung mani mamanikaka na tumo didinowa auna zo yumai pasena tamoiye sero, niye bere-bere daba bainakama zo emo auna dube kimegairo wito kurura musugaya gutai teng yariniya. Noeno okowata, emo amimene pasena oko yaore oura gutero magayariniya, awiya nona eo yao gege. Arata nung pasena yai aune Tuwa Bayau mene abena pugariniya, awiya nona mou-mesa yao.
