42023013	Pilato nung pirisa babuze diyare emo baunone yau senu buro augaiwa
42023014	awong eno eyero sena, “Niye emo ewiya puro nana-una buro nung emo bauno winade yaese dubo uwinoiya ayero seseya giro na benaung ninae-ina etu susuwa nuna gari sero atata yetena. Arata niye ge nora sero emo ewiya gera pugatinei? Na pasena nuna zo za nibamu oko tamena. Aung ara.
42023015	Herode nung dema ayero yero giro nupema pugai naname-una bumiya. Arare sana nigipu. Pasena nung daya magayaine yao awiya oko gosinena.
42023016	Arare na sana nung waung mene wezero dero besaya babariniya.” Ayero sena ara.
42023017	Arata tani eyao ine yero nasani nauwa. Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna iya oregao be kasa naunu Pilato mene aratamao nunae-una mani zo besinaunu nunae-una baungno nasani nauna.
42023018	Arare Pilato ge ayero senu giro emo bauno dubu baina amimene teng-tetemo girara sero be kerero wawa sinasani eyero sewa, “Emo awiya depu magayai Barabas besaya kasa yero nanae-una bumae.”
42023019	Barabas nung gitau napo mokora atu winade zo diya emore nete mani zo denu magayenu giro nung bunao gare pugaiwa mitauna.
42023020	Pilato mene Yesu besari sero awong eno ge nupema sena,
42023021	arata awong nupema wawa sero eyero sewa, “Nung i pasaora depu! Nung i pasaora depu!”
42023022	Ayero sewa nung nupema awong eno senu be etama yena, “Noeno ayero sinei? Nung pasena no yeni? Na pasena nuna meko nung daya magayaine yao awiya kau nena. Arare na sana nung waung mene wezero dero duwaya babariniya.”
42023023	Ayero sena, arata awong be kerero nung i pasaora atu magayaise wawa sewa. Ayero sewa wawa nunae mene Pilatora ge puro wosina.
42023024	Ayenu giro Pilato mene ge nunae nigiro ge awiya tauyaise sena.
42023025	Emo zo gitau winade diyare nete mani denu magayenu nung bunao gare pugaiwa mitasani nauna, nung awiya emo bauno mene pumari sewa giro Pilato mene besenu baungna. Ora Yesu awiya emo bauno mene nung magayaise sewa giro Pilato mene gorobo emora waweng pugaina arauwa.
42023026	Awong Yesu puro bautunete emo zo nagibe atu tamuwa. Emo awiya yazo nuna Simon. Nung Sairini napora. Nung buro napo baina auna atu towari sero butunenu awong nung saniro i pasao puro nuna-una apapara pugaiwa diungno Yesu ago yero baungna ara.
42023027	Emo bauno dubu baina awong nung ago yero bautunewa mani bauno witao mene nung eno zire-buware nasani dubo minaore bamuwa.
42023028	Anewa Yesu nung kapetegairo awong eno eyero sena, “O Yerusalem mani bauno, niye na eno zi oko sepu. Niye nika niyetope arita mani awiso ninae eno zi sepu.
42023029	Sana nigipu. Ago be kasa yariniya be aune niye dubo mininasani eyero sarineya, ‘Bauno wagaung dopaota bauno mani aming oko gayao nowa amimene yawa yawa yaese.’
42023030	Be aune emo bauno mene diri eno eyero sarineya, ‘Niye dure nanae tame gaipu.’ Nupema diri mamanikaka eno eyero sarineya, ‘Niye wosipu nae worae.’
42023031	Iwo mene na i mesa yao ine awiya puro iyaora pugatineya, arare ago awong niye i soyao ine awiya iyaora pugari yaya niye nono yarinei?” Ayero sena arauwa.
42023032	Awong pasena mani etobe Yesu aune dema daya magayaetose puro bamuwa ara.
42023033	Awong baungno soma zo yazo Ziyo Atora Wetu, auna kasa yero Yesu i pasaora dewa ara. Ayero yero pasena mani etobe dema dero Yesura-una zo enaba zo enaba ayero pugaiwa ara.
42023034	Ayero yewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “O Mama, awong susuwa nana oko gao nasani tani ewiya neyare ning pasena nunae yangdo.” Ayero sena ara. Awong Yesu dero aune taung wori nuna awiya bono yero pumari kotungno ge tuwao zo yazo nuna laki ayewa.
42023035	Emo bauno awong dopero anuwing nasani mitiwa ara. Ora diya sao mene zo awong nung maze izinasani eyero sewa, “Nung gitau emo ena soreuno kora yero nasani nauna, arare Tuwa Bayau nung punu Tuwa naname Kristo me yero nasani giro nung nuka nutope soremaise.”
42023036	Gorobo emo dema nung izewa. Awong nuna-una nugu buro ou dokowang yao nung eno pugairo
42023037	eyero sewa, “Ning Yuda emora emo tuwa yero nasani giro ning nika nitope soreung.”
42023038	Owe zo nuna-una ziyo gomina atu eyero gaewa, “Emo ewiya Yuda emora emo tuwa.”
42023039	Pasena mani etobe awongto dema dewa auna zo mene Yesu izinasani eyero sena, “Ning Sorao Emo nanae Kristo asineyare ning nika nitope sorepunasani nato dema soreung.”
42023040	Ayero senu pasena mani zo mene ge awiya nigiro nung gona nasani eyero sena, “Ning Tuwa Bayau awang nesita? Name magayanenese deteya.
42023041	Arata awong nao deteya awiya tani iwaing. Noeno okowata, nao tani meko gitau yewangno auna abena tapunenano ara. Arata emo emimene zo nung gitau tani meko zo oko yena ara.”
42023042	Ayero sero aune eyero sena, “Yesu, ning ago emo tuwa yero nete kasa yero na kotung.”
42023043	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na ge me ning eno sinena. Be yeme eune ning na aune dema napo iwaing Paradais auna mitarinesa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
42023044	-
42023045	Arare wari diti 12 kilok yenu warira waegao aung yenu mume baina kasa yero tawing teng yero mitinu 3 kilok yena ara. Ayero yenu Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana mo bainakama kimegao awiya kerero dao etobe yena.
42023046	Anenu Yesu be kerero wawa sinasani eyero sena, “Mama, ititi nana wawong nina-una pugatinena.” Ayero senu oweno nuna aung yenu magayena ara.
42023047	Gorobo emora diya mene tani awiya giro Tuwa Bayaura yazo de ika gatinasani eyero sena, “Ge me nibamu, emo ewiya nung meba pasena aung.” Ayero sena ara.
42023048	Ora emo bauno dubu baina buro mitiwa amimene tani apakana kasa yena awiya giro aung yero awong dubo mininasani nupema kapetegairo bamuwa ara.
42023049	Arata Yesura otao mani aune mani bauno awong nung ago yero Galilaya atu bumuwa amimene akepari yero dopero mitasani tani kasa yena awiya giro aung yewa arauwa.
42023050	Emo zo nasani nauna yazo nuna Yosefe. Nung Yuda emora napo yazo Arimatia auna emo. Nung awiya Yuda emora gitau yao dubu auna zo. Nung awiya emo etutero nao, tani iwaing gege nasani nauna.
42023051	Otao mani nuna mene Yesu gera pugairo dari sewa nung giginu meko yenu awong oko soremao yangduna. Emo amimene Tuwa Bayau nata Tuwa yero nariniya auna be diya nasani nauna.
42023052	Emo amimene Pilatora-una baungno Yesura taung aingso pumari sena.
42023053	Senu niginu taung aingso nuna i pasaora atu puro mo neyangyao imoko-kaungkaung mene ewero puro pu daba uma zo wamao auna gaina. Gitau emo zora taung aingso atu oko pugao.
42023054	Sabat iyara nona kora nasani mitiwa ture itinenu aune nung Yesura taung aingso daba umana pugainu wari diti 6 kilok yenu Sabatra be kasa yena.
42023055	Bauno awong gitau Galilaya atu Yesu aune dema bumuwa amimene Yosefe ago yero baungno biriti awiya gigiwa ara. Ayero nasani Yosefe nung Yesura taung aingso nono nono yero pugaina awiya dema gigiwa.
42023056	Awong giro nupema kapetegairo garo nunae-una baungno ou sereyao uweri enane sosewa. Sosewa Sabat iya kasa yenu giro awong sao tauyao ge dipunasani doro mitiwa arauwa.
42024001	Sande iya gatinenu gora-gara gumorore awong ou sereyao gitau sosewa awiya puro biritira bamuwa ara.
42024002	Baungno eyero gigiwa: Daba biritira daba uma be gazao awiya dereme yero baungno demese atu mitinu gigiwa.
42024003	Ayenu mitinu giro daba umana toiwa, arata awong Tuwa Yesura aingso kau yewa.
42024004	Awong aingso kau yero iwawa nasani mitiwa emo etobe taung wori nunato awiya neyangyero waegatinena amimene nunae-una nugu atu dopero mitiwato gigiwa.
42024005	Bauno awongto giro awang yero diti wese tawingna yero tawing anuwing newa aune emo etobe amimene awong eno eyero sewato, “Niye noeno buro emo naore awiya magayaora masira etu kau nei?
42024006	Nung etu oko mitiya. Nung yemaoko iropumiya. Niye ge gitau Galilaya atu niye eno sena awiya kotungno gipu.
42024007	Nung niye eno eyero sena, ‘Awong na Emora Mani pu pasena emora waweng garineya. Ayero yaya awong na i pasaora daya magayarinena. Magayero be etama ayao aung yai aune nupema seka yero iroparinena.’ Niye eno ayero sena.”
42024008	Emo etobe mene ayero sewato giro bauno awong Yesu ge gitau sena awiya kotumuwa kasa yena.
42024009	Ayenu awong biriti doro nupema kapetegairo baungno buro-mani nuna 11 aune emo bauno ena eno dema nona kasa yenu gigiwa auna ge ungwe yewa.
42024010	Bauno emimene ge awiya aposolo eno sewa: Maria nung Madala napora, Yoana, Yakobora ai Maria, awong aune bauno ena amimene ge awiya aposolo eno sewa.
42024011	Arata aposolo mene baunona ge nigiwa me aung yenu giro yangduwa.
42024012	Arata Petoro mene zo iropuro sungno baungno daba umana atu utero diti mokora yero mo gege mitinu gigina. Ayero yero nupema kapetegairo gare baungno nona kasa yena auna susuwa kau nasani kotumao nuna gagausena.
42024013	Wari be dekaongka aune nunae-una emo etobe awongto ang yero baungno napo maingkoka zo yazo Emeas auna yari bamuwato. Nagibo Yerusalem doro baungno Emeas yao awiya 11 kilomita.
42024014	Awongto bautu nasani tani kasa yenu gigiwato auna ungwe didinasani
42024015	bautunewato Yesu nung nuka nutope kasa nunato-una yero awongto aune dema baungna.
42024016	Awongto nung aune dema bautunasani nung gigiwato oko kasa yena, noeno okowata, Tuwa Bayau mene awongto Yesu saore gowito sero dubora diti awenato gazena.
42024017	Aune nung awongto eno eyero sena, “Nito ge ungwe nora yero butuneito?” Ayero senu awongto dopero dubo mininasani mitiwato
42024018	Aune nunato-una zo yazo nuna Kliopa amimene ge abena eyero sena, “Esewa Yerusalem atu augatinasani nowa amimene tani baina be yeme eune kasa yetiya auna bowi awiya nigitineya. Aune ning nata amimene nono yero oko nigao nete aune buro nato atata nesi?”
42024019	Ayero senu Yesu mene awongto nupema atata yero eyero sena, “Tani nomaze sineito?” Ayero senu awongto nung eno eyero sewato, “Tani awiya Yesu Nasarete napora emo auna-una atu kasa yetiya amaze sinenato. Nung porofete, arare nung tani putoungne yero nasani ge putoungne tugata yero nasani Tuwa Bayaura benaungna o emo baunona benaungna atu noiya.
42024020	Arata pirisa babuze aune emo gitau yao babuze nanae awong amimene nung daya magayaise sero nung iwora waweng pugeya awong nung i pasaora deteya magayetiya.
42024021	Arata nae eyero kotupunasani nonane. Emo amimene Isreli emo nae iwora waweng atu sorariniya. Awiya gege okowata, deteya magayeti nenane wari be etama niya.
42024022	Arata be yeme eune dubu nanae-una bauno ena mene ge zo seseya nae nigiro kotumao nanae sisigatini iwawa nenane. Awiya awong iya gatini gora-gara gumorore iropuro biritira baungno
42024023	Yesura aingso oko gigeya. Ayero yero awong nupema tera kapetegairo ge eyero seseya, ‘Nae angelo gigenane angelo mene nung nupema seka yero iropumiya ayero seseyato.’
42024024	Bauno mene ayero seseya giro dubu nanae-una emo ena mene iropuro biritira baungno bauno mene ge seseya ayao ine teng gigeya. Arata nung zo oko gigeya.”
42024025	Ayero sewato giro Yesu mene awongto eno ge eyero sena, “Nito kotumao aung. Ge apakana porofete mene gaewa awiya niye nono yero gao me yaora timara yero nowi?
42024026	Sorao Emo Kristo nung gitau yaya taungno aune ago simao waegaore nuna pumaise sao mitiya, awiya niye oko gao ing?”
42024027	Yesu mene ayero sero aune ge nuna Tuwara gera gaewa mitoiya auna susuwa awiya awongto eno keregari sero ge Mose aune porofete apakana amimene gaewa auna atu zayero momo-zimomo yero sena ara.
42024028	Awong bautunete kasaye napo auna nugu gaiwa aune Yesu nung awongto yangdoro darama babari sero yenu giro
42024029	awongto nung sorero eyero sewato, “Wari wowosini ping mena iyariniya. Arare ning nato aune dema mitaisa.” Ayero sewato giro nung awongto aune dema baungno awenato gare yena.
42024030	Ayero atu mitasani awong nona minari nasani newa giro nung ame puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero eero awongto eno pugaina ara.
42024031	Nung awongto eno ayero yenu awongto nung gigiwato kasa yenu giro nung mena aungne gaina.
42024032	Ayero yenu awongto eyero sewato, “Name nagibe atu ang nenane nung nao eno ge tugata yetiya, nupema gera susuwa nao eno keregaiya, be aune moko nanao mene yo wigaga yetiya.”
42024033	Awongto ge ayero sero iropuro ang yero nupema kapetegairo Yerusalem bamuwato ara. Ayero awongto buro-mani 11 awong otao mani enane augairo mitiwa tamuwato ara.
42024034	Tamuwato awong awongto eno eyero sewa, “Ge me nibamu. Tuwa nupema iropumiya. Iropuro Simonna-una kasa yeti gigiya.”
42024035	Ayero sewa awongto nagibe atu ang nasani tani yewa auna ungwe didinasani sewato, “Nung ame eeti aune nato nung gigenato kasa yetiya.” Ayero sewato arauwa.
42024036	Awong ge awiya sinasani mitiwa Yesu nung nuka nutope nunae-una towang daung atu kasa yero dopero eyero sena, “Niye dubo iwaingne mitiungpu.”
42024037	Ayero senu awong sopine yero iwaeta ayero sero awang yero babari yewa.
42024038	Ayewa giro nune awong eno eyero sena, “Niye noeno iwawa nasani kotumao ninae sisigati nei?
42024039	Niye te-wawong nana gipu, na naka natope kasa yero mitena. Wawong ninae mene na iniro gipu. Iwae awiya taung aingso aung, arata nane mene zo taung aingsore mitena era.”
42024040	Ayero sero nung te-wawong nuna awong eno gipena.
42024041	Ayero yenu awong nung giro yawa yawa bainakama yewa, arata nupema iwawa yero ge aung yenu bora-bora yero mitiwa giro nung awong eno eyero sena, “Ninae-una nona ena minao etu mitita?”
42024042	Ayero senu giro wo ito gitau igi yewa mitina awiya pugaiwa
42024043	nung nunae benaungna atu puro minina.
42024044	Nung ge awong eno eyero sena, “Gitau na niye aune dema nasani eyero sewang, ‘Ge na eno gitau gaewa — Mosera sao tauyao ge auna atuta porofetera bukura atuta Sam bukura atu gaewa — ge awiya apakana me yariniya.’ Ayero sewang.”
42024045	Ayero sero nung kotumao nunae ininu tang senu awong be aune Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao auna susuwa gigiwa kasa yena ara.
42024046	Nung awong eno eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao eyero mitiya. Na Sorao Emo ninae Kristo mene yaya taungno magayana wari be etama aung yai aune nupema biritira atu iroparinena.
42024047	Arare niye Yerusalem etu zayero bowi nana keregaya emo bauno dubu sero sero amimene nigiro yazo nana yau sinasani dubo darawa yaya aune Tuwa Bayau mene pasena nunae yangduwariniya.
42024048	Niye tani apakana gosinowa auna ge keregairo sinasani neupu.
42024049	Sana nigipu. Oweno Mama nana mene niye eno pugari sena awiya iyengtana wosi ninae-una yariniya. Arata niye napo ewiya oko yangduwae. Niye etu mitaya putoung uritira atu wosi ninae-una yai aune napo doro burora babarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
42024050	Yesu mene ayero sero awong puro baung Betani nape yero nung wawong buyagairo ikapari yero awong gao yena.
42024051	Nung awong gao nenu aune Tuwa Bayau mene nung punu nung awong yangdoro witi uritira yena.
42024052	Ayero yenu awong nung bowi yero yawa yawa bainakama nasani nupema wesora kapete Yerusalem gairo bamuwa.
42024053	Atu baungno nasani awong be ozaung-zaung ibu bainana atu toiro Tuwa Bayaura yazo de ika gatinasani nauwa arauwa.
43001001	Ge bera nung nao gege nasani nauna. Ge bera nung Tuwa Bayaura benaungna atu nasani nauna. Ge bera nung nutope Tuwa Bayau.
43001002	Nung awiya gitau susuwara otu Tuwa Bayau aune dema nao gege nasani nauna.
43001003	Ge bera nung Tuwa Bayaura wawong yero nona apakana yero aung yena. Arare nona kasayena, awiya nung aung nona zo oko kasayena.
43001004	Nao awiya nuna-una mitauna. Arare nao awiya emora-ina waegairo mitauna ara.
43001005	Waegao mene mume waegainu mume mene waegao disari kaputena, arata waegatinoiya.
43001006	Tuwa Bayau mene emo zo giginu kasayero nasani nauna yazo nuna Yohane.
43001007	Nung amimene waegaora bowi sari buna. Emo bauno apakana waegaora Maung tumo diyaese sero Tuwa Bayau mene senu kasayena ara.
43001008	Yohane nung nutope waegaora Maung okowata. Nung waegaora bowi gege maze sari buna.
43001009	Waegao me nung emo bauno apakana awiya waegao pugatinoiya, amimene be aune tawingna atu kasayero nasani nauna.
43001010	Nung tawingna atu mitauna. Awiya gege okowata. Tawing dema nune yena ara. Ayero yena, arata tawingna emo bauno awong nung saore oko giro baingtiwa.
43001011	Nung tawing nuna-una kasayena, arata dubu nuna mene nung gosinasani aune nupema oko gao ine yewa.
43001012	Arata ena mene awong nung otao yewa, o nung tumo diwa amimene Tuwa Bayaura mani awiso yaese sero nung yazo nunae mena puna ara.
43001013	Awong emora yura kasa yero Tuwa Bayaura mani awiso oko yewa. Awong emora aratamaora okowata, o emora sao tauyaora okowata, awong Tuwa Bayaura putoungna kasa yero mani awiso nuna yewa ara.
43001014	Ge bera nung emo yero kasayero naname-una towang atu nasani nauna. Ayero yenu nae simao waegaore nuna gigiwangne. Nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani me, arare simao waegaore nuna-una gege mitauna. Nao mere monone awiya dubo nuna-una bebunu puro wosina ara.
43001015	Susuwa nuna awiya Yohane mene puro daung gairo wawa sero eyero sena, “Na nung aeno eyero sewang, ‘Ago butuniya amimene nung gitau yao nana niya. Noeno okowata, na oko kasayaore nung nasani nauna.’” Yohane mene ayero sena ara.
43001016	Name apakana amimene soremao iwawaing awiya zamena simena nuna-una atu pupunasani nonane.
43001017	Tuwa Bayau mene sao tauyao ge name eno pugari sero Mose eno pugaina ara. Arata Tuwa Bayau mene nao mere monone awiya name eno pugari sero Yesu Kristo eno pugainu puro buna ara.
43001018	Tuwa Bayau nung emo zo mene oko gigina. Aung nibamu arauwa. Arare Mani nuna dekaongka nuna-una deungbera mitoiya amimene Maung nuna name eno keregaina arauwa.
43001019	Yuda emora gitau yao Yerusalem atu nauwa amimene pirisa ena wati mugo nunae aune awong awiya iyengtiro sewa baungno Yohane atata yero eyero sewa, “Ning emo aweni?”
43001020	Ayero sewa Yohane nung susuwa nuna oko pungyao keregairo eyero sena, “Na Sorao emo ninae Kristo okowa.”
43001021	Ayero senu awong nupema atata yero eyero sewa, “Aune ning aweni? Ning Kristora ai mani Eliya ing?” Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Na Eliya okowa.” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Ning porofete diya yero nonane awiya ning ari?” Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Aung arauwa.”
43001022	Ayero senu awong nupema atata yero eyero sewa, “Ora ning aweni? Nae baungno emo babuze nae seseya bumenane aeno ge no sarinenine? Ning nitope susuwa nina se niganene.”
43001023	Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Porofete Yesaya mene ge zo gaena awiya nana-una atu me niya. Na bowi sao emo eu yanawira atu nasani eyero sero nona, ‘Tuwara nagibo kora yepu korosae.’” Ayero sena arauwa.
43001024	Emo Yohanena-una bumuwa awiya Farisayo mene iyengtiwa bumuwa ara.
43001025	Arare awong nung nupema atata yero eyero sewa, “Ning sorao emo nanae Kristo oko siya, o Eliya oko siya, porofete oko siya, sinesa awiya gi. Arare ning nono yero emo bauno ge ou susunesi?”
43001026	Ayero sewa Yohane mene abena eyero sena, “Na emo bauno ou gege susunena ara. Arata ninae-una atu zo kasayero mitiya, niye nung oko gosinowa.
43001027	Nune nana-ina bautara bumariniya amimene emo bainakama. Na emo wosao nibamu amimene te soga nuna-una angsi besao ine teng oko yariniya. ” Ayero sena ara.
43001028	Susuwa awiya napo Betania, ou Yodan enabara mitauna, auna atu kasa yena. Yohane mene atu nasani atu emo bauno ge ou susunauna arauwa.
43001029	Iya gainu Yesu mene Yohanena-una bautu nenu nung ake atu giro eyero sena, “Owiya gipu. Tuwa Bayaura lama mani ara. Nune tawing sero sero emo bauno auna pasena nunae diungno magayariniya.
43001030	Na nung aeno eyero sewang, ‘Ago butuniya nung gitau yao nana niya. Noeno okowata na oko kasayaore nauna.’ Nung awiya ora.
43001031	Na natope nung gitau oko gigiwang kasa yena. Arata Isreli emo niye bowi nuna sana nigaese sero na kasa yero ge ou zayewang.”
43001032	Yohane mene emo eno ge ayero sero aune zo eyero sena, “Oweno mene ni audubo ine yero uritira atu wosiro nuna-una adungno mitinu na gigiwang.
43001033	Na gitau nung oko gigiwang kasa yena, arata Tuwa Bayau mene na emo bauno ge ou suwanese sero eyero sena, ‘Oweno wosiro nuna-una adungno mitari niya emo amimene ge sai aune emo bauno Oweno pumarineya.’
43001034	Na susuwa nuna giro eyero sinena: Nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani me.” Yohane mene ge ayero sena arauwa.
43001035	Iya gainu Yohane buro-mani nuna etobe aune amimene dopero mitiwa
43001036	Yesu butunenu giro Yohane mene eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayaura lama ora.”
43001037	Ayero senu buro-mani nuna etobe mene ge awiya nigiro Yesura-una ame bamuwato ara.
43001038	Bautunewato Yesu mene kapetegairo giro awongto eno eyero sena, “Nito no kau neito?” Ayero senu awongto eyero sewato, “Rabai, (Ge naname-una, ‘Gipao emo’) ning garo nauna atu mitesi?”
43001039	Ayero sewato Yesu mene eyero sena, “Bungputo gaeto.” Ayero senu mani etobe amimene nung ago yero gare witiwato ara. Witiro wari awiya nung aune dema mitete duwato wari wosiro wari diti 4 kilok yena ara.
43001040	Awongto Yohanena ge nigiro Yesu ago yewato auna zo yazo nuna Anderea. Nung Simon Petorora meta.
43001041	Anderea nung tato nuna Simon awiya mena taungno eyero sena, “Nato Yuda emora sorao emo yazo nuna Mesia awiya tamenato.” (Mesia awiya Kristo.)
43001042	Ayero sero Yesura-una yuno baungno kasa yewato Yesu mene Petoro giro eyero sena, “Yazo nina Simon. Ning Yohanena mani. Arata na yazo nina sekawa Sifas asinena arauwa.” (Ge naname-una Daba Domito.) Ayero sena arauwa.
43001043	Iya gainu Yesu nung Galilaya tawingna babari sero nasani aune Filip giro eyero sena. “Ning na ago ye.” Ayero sena ara.
43001044	Filip nung Besaida napora. Andereato Petoro awong napo dekaongka auna ara.
43001045	Arare Filip mene Nataniel taungno eyero sena, “Emo zo Mose mene sao tauyao gera atu ge nuna gaena, arita porofete ena mene deka ayero gaewa, emo awiya tamenane. Nung Yesu Yosepera mani. Nung Nasarete napora arauwa.”
43001046	Ayero senu Nataniel mene ge abena eyero sena, “Nona iwaing zo mene Nasarete nape atu kasa yai teng yarinita?” Ayero senu Filip mene abena eyero sena, “Ayero sinesare bung babanano gase.”
43001047	Ayero senu Nataniel nung Yesura-una baungnu Yesu mene giro eyero sena, “Ewiya gipu. Emo ewiya Isreli emo me. Ge iwao dubo nuna-una oko mitiya.”
43001048	Ayero senu Nataniel mene Yesu atata yero eyero sena, “Na natu newang gigasi?” Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Filip mene ning oko tamaore na mena ning i fik susuwara atu mitesa gigena arauwa.”
43001049	Ayero senu Nataniel mene abena eyero sena, “Gipao emo, ning Tuwa Bayaura Mani me. Ning Isreli emora emo tuwa.”
43001050	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Ning i fik susuwara atu mitesa giro sesena auna eno gege na tumo didinesa? Tani yeme gigesa awiya agewa gege. Ago nona me baina kasa yero babai gosinarinesa.”
43001051	Ayero sero nung eno eyero sena, “Na memokoba sane. Niye uriti be gausai Tuwa Bayaura angelo dubu mene na Emora Mani auna-una witiro wosiro anaya garineya ara.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43002001	Wari be etobe aung yenu Galilaya tawingna napo zo yazo Kena auna atu emo mene bauno ataise sero ana bonene newa Yesura ai dema mitina.
43002002	Yesu buro-mani nuna aune awong dema babaese sewa giro baungno augaiwa.
43002003	Augairo mitasani ou wain miniwa aung yenu giro Yesura ai mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ou wain nunae aung yetiya.”
43002004	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na awong soremanese aeno sinesita? Auna be nana oko bao.”
43002005	Ayero senu aune ai nuna mene soumani eno eyero sena, “Yesu mene buro ge nomaze sariniye, amaze diungno yepu.” Ayero sena ara.
43002006	Be aune garo auna atu au babuze 6 mitiwa ara. Yuda emora-una garo sero au ayao ine mitaunu aune awong ewowora tani nasani nonane taungne sainasani nauwa. Au awiya babuze. Au dekaongka auna ou baketi 10 mene sukupunauwa.
43002007	Arare Yesu mene soumani eno eyero sena, “Niye ou dungno aura yasagaipu bebumae.” Ayero senu soumani mene ou dungno aura yasagaiwa bebumuwa ara.
43002008	Ayero yewa aune nung eyero sena, “Niye ou aura awiya ena dungno bonene maung eno puro baungpu.” Ayero senu giro ou awiya
43002009	dungno puro bonene maung eno puro bautunewa ou awiya wain yena ara. Puro bamuwa bonene maung mene mininu bera atu mege yena. Ayero yenu nung ou wain awiya natu buna auna susuwa nung oko gao, arata soumani ou dumuwa amimene gigiwa. Arare bonene maung mene emo bauno atitinena awiya yau senu bunu
43002010	eyero sena, “Nae gitau ou wain me pugatinonane mininowa dubo sisigati noi aune, ou wain zuma wosao awiya ago pugatinonane mininowa. Tani nanae ayao mitiya ara. Arata nine mene zo ou wain me pungyero ou wain zuma wosao gitau pugesa mineya aune me ago pugatinesa.” Ayero sena ara.
43002011	Yesu nung Kena napo Galilaya tawingna atu tani putoungne nuna naungna awiya gitau atu zayero yena ara. Ayero yero nung putoung nuna keregainu buro-mani nuna mene tani putoungne awiya giro nung tumo diwa arauwa.
43002012	Ataora bonene aung yenu Yesu nung Kena napo doro baung Kapaneam nape yari nenu ai nuna metamaine aune buro-mani nuna amimene nung aune dema bamuwa ara. Baungno atu be daigairo oko nauwa.
43002013	Yuda emora iya dang be zo yazo nuna Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna be nugu yenu giro Yesu mene Yerusalem witiro baungna.
43002014	Yerusalem nape kasa yero Tuwa Bayaura ibu baina auna pae zo kasa ewe gao auna baungno atu lama aune bulimakao arita ni gumo awiya puro baungno wina-piti nasani newa gigina. Anasani moni tewo tame pugairo moni wina-piti nasani mitiwa
43002015	giro Yesu mene angsi ena puro tenero aune amimene lama bulimakao aune emore dema tunenu bamuwa tewo monine ininu kapetegainu moni wosi duru yena ara.
43002016	Ayero yero emo ni gumo puro dopero mitiwa aeno eyero sena, “Puro baungpu. Niye Mama nana-una ibura etu nona wina-piti yaya stowa ibu ine yoiye sero awang sinena.” Ayero sena ara.
43002017	Yesu nung ayero yenu buro-mani nuna mene ge zo gayao mitoiya awiya kotumuwa. Ge awiya eyao era. Ibu nina ewiya eno tini nana kapinoiya.
43002018	Arare Yuda emo mene Yesu atata yero eyero sewa, “Awe mene sesi tani awiya yetesi? Tuwa Bayau mene sai yarinesa awiya susuwa awiya pu daung gari sero tani putoungne zo ye ganene.”
43002019	Ayero sewa Yesu mene be nunae-una ge puro abena eyero sena, “Niye ibu ewiya kasaya nane wari be etama gege mena yana nupema dopariniya.”
43002020	Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Mamono nanae mene ibu ewiya dawang 46 ayao gapunawe besugaiwa, awiya nine wari be etama gege yasa dopaise sinesa?” Ayero sewa ara.
43002021	Arata Yesu nung taung aingso nuna-una ge awiya pu ibu bainana gairo sena ara.
43002022	Arare ago nete magayero aune magayaora atu seka yero iropunu aune buro-mani nuna mene ge awiya kotumuwa ara. Ayero kotupunasani Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao ena aune ge Yesu mene sena aune awiya gigiwa me yena.
43002023	Yesu Yerusalem atu mitasani iya dang auna atu tani putoungne ena yenu emo daigairo mene tani putoungne awiya giro Yesu tumo diwa ara.
43002024	Yesu nung nutope emora moko gosinasani susuwa nuna awong eno oko keregao.
43002025	Nung emo zora susuwa gari sero emo ena oko atata yero nasani nauna. Nung nutope emora kotumao giro baingtiti nasani nauna arauwa.
43003001	Emo zo nasani nauna yazo nuna Nikodema. Nung Farisayo zo. Nung Yuda emora gitau yao bainakama yero nasani nauna.
43003002	Emo amimene pingne Yesura-una baungno eyero sena, “Gipao emo, nae susuwa nina gosinonane. Ning gipao emo me mene Tuwa Bayaura bera bumasa. Ning tani yero nosa awiya emo mene Tuwa Bayau aung nasani yao ine oko mitiya.”
43003003	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena nung eno eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana gi. Zo nung kasa yao seka nupema oko kasa yao yariniya, awiya nung Tuwa Bayaura napo gao ine teng oko.”
43003004	Ayero senu Nikodema mene abena eyero sena, “Zo nung zai yao mene nono yero aune kasa yao seka nupema kasa yariniye? Nung aira tingyana nupema towai aune pumao teng oko yarinita?”
43003005	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana gi. Zo nung oura ta owenona putoungna oko kasa yao yariniya, awiya nung Tuwa Bayaura nape babao ine teng oko yariniya.
43003006	Zo nung emora mesara kasa yao awiya tawingna taung aingsore dema noiya. Arata zo nung Owenona mesara kasa yao awiya Owenone dema noiya.
43003007	Niye kasayao seka kasayaese sesena awiya nigiro wawong di oko gamase.
43003008	Bisi nung tebe-tabe supunoi ning bewing nuna gege nigitinosa, arata susuwa natu zayero butuniye o baungno natu aung niye, awiya ning susuwa oko gosinosa. Deka ayero zo nung Owenona mesara kasa yao auna susuwa ning oko gosinosa.”
43003009	Ayero senu Nikodema mene abena eyero sena, “Tani awiya nono yero kasayari niye?”
43003010	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Ning Isreli emora gipao emo mene tani awiya oko gao nosa ing?
43003011	“Na memokoba sane. Nae nona dubora diti mene gosinonane, o nona diti moko mene gosinonane deka awiya sero nonane ara. Ayero yero nonane niye ge nanae doro nowa ara.
43003012	Nona tawingna etu kasa yero noiya awiya sero nona giro nowa me oko yero noiya amimene uritira nona mitiya awiya sana nono yero gaya me yariniye?
43003013	Emo zo mene uritira witiro nawe oko wosina. Na Emora Mani nata uritira atu wosiwang. Nane gege nata uritira nona gosinena.
43003014	Mose mene gitau eu yanawira atu kapa puro yi yero puro witiro i pasaora ikogaina deka ayero na Emora Mani i pasaora ikogaese sao mitiya.
43003015	Arare na tumo diyarineya amimene nao me iwaing awiya tamarineya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43003016	Zo nung Tuwa Bayaura mani tumo diyariniya amimene magayero mekora babaise okowata, nung nao me iwaing tamaise sero Tuwa Bayau mene emo bauno name eno dubo bayao bainakama nasani Mani nuna dekaongka iyengtinu wosina ara.
43003017	Tuwa Bayaura Mani mene emo gera pugaise auna okowata, emo soraise sero Tuwa Bayau mene senu wosina ara.
43003018	Zo nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani tumo diyariniya amimene Tuwa Bayaura kotora atu oko zuwariniya. Zo nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani oko tumo diyao yariniya nung amimene kotora atu mena zuwetiya ayero yariniya. Noeno okowata, nung Tuwa Bayaura mani dekaongka awiya oko tumo diyao yero noiya.
43003019	Arare kotora atu zuwao auna susuwa eyero mitiya era. Waegao mene tawingna kasa yenu emo awong waegaora babao awang sero mumena katu mitari sewa ara. Awong nao nunae meko, arare ayero yewa.
43003020	Zo nung pasena yero noiya amimene waegao awang noiya. Waegao mene pasena nuna-una susuwa keregoiye sero awang nasani nung waegaora oko kasa yariniya.
43003021	Awong ge me nigiro puro nowa amimene waegaora kasa yero nowa. Zo nung waegaora kasa yai waegao mene buro nuna-una susuwa keregatinai emo bauno mene giro buro nuna-una me awiya Tuwa Bayaura putoungna atu kasa yero noiya ayero sarineya.
43003022	Yesu mene buro-mani nuna punu Yerusalem doro Yudaya tawing agewara baungno nauwa. Atu nasani aune emo ena ge ou suwena.
43003023	Yohane dema emo bauno ge ou susunasani mitina. Nung tawing zo yazo Ainon, Selim nape ina atu nasani ge ou suwao buro nasani nauna. Nung tawing auna atu nasani nauna, noeno okowata, ou baina atu mitauna. Arare emo bauno nuna-una butunauwa ge ou susunauna ara.
43003024	Yohane nung be aune Herode mene bunao gare oko pugaore atu buro nasani nauna.
43003025	Arare Yuda emo zo aune Yohanena buro-mani awong taung aingso sayaora tani auna ge wina-se yewa ara.
43003026	Ge sinete buro-mani mene baung Yohanena-una yero eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, gitau ning ou Yodan enabara atu nauwasa emo buro ning taunu susuwa nuna nae eno keregairo sasa, emo amimene be yeme eune emo bauno ge ou susunasani miti giro apakana nuna-una bautuneya.”
43003027	Ayero sewa Yohane mene eyero sena,” Emo zo nung uritira Maung mene nona nung eno oko pugao yai nung nutope nona awiya pao ine teng oko ara.
43003028	Na eyero sinasani niye eno sewang gigiwa, ‘Na Kristo okowa, arata Tuwa Bayau mene na pugainu nane nagibo nuna gitau nena.’
43003029	Emo zo bauno atariniya bauno awiya nuna gege ara. Arare nung yawa yawa nai otao nuna mene nugu dopero ge nuna nigiro deka ayero dubo iwaing yariniya. Emo bauno mene Yesura-una babeya, arare dubo iwaing yaora be nana kasa yetiya.
43003030	Nune na daigairo emo tuwa bainakama nibamu yariniya. Arata nane mene zo nuna wese nibamu yarinena.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43003031	Ika atu wosina amimene witao naname ara. Zo nung tawingna etu kasa yao amimene tawing euna, arare nung tawingna ge sinoiya. Arata uritira atu wosina amimene name apakana daigairo baina naname yero noiya ara.
43003032	Nune uritira nona gosinasani nauna awiya name eno keregairo sinoiya, arata emo mene ge nuna dotinowa.
43003033	Zo nung Maina ge nigiro puro pu dube gairo noiya amimene ayero nasani ‘Tuwa Bayau ge me sinoiya’ asero noiya.
43003034	Emo Tuwa Bayau mene senu wosina amimene Tuwa Bayaura ge sinoiya. Noeno okowata, Tuwa Bayau mene Oweno zere tutupore apana nung eno pugao gege pugatinoiya.
43003035	Maung nung Mani nuna aratapu nasani nona apakana Mani nuna-una waweng pugainu mitoiya.
43003036	Zo nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani tumo didinoiya amimene nao me iwaing puro noiya. Arata zo nung Tuwa Bayaura Mani auna ge dero noiya amimene nao me iwaing oko gariniya. Emo ayao auna atu Tuwa Bayaura tini kapao mene mitao gege mitariniya.
43004001	Farisayo awong Yesura bowi eyero nigiwa, “Yesu nung mani daigairo puro ge ou susuniya, arare emo bauno nung ago neya amimene Yohane ago nowa awiya daigatineya.” Ayero nigiwa ara.
43004002	Arata Yesu nung nutope emo zo ge ou oko suwena. Buro-mani nuna mene emo bauno ge ou susunauwa ara.
43004003	Arare Farisayo ge ayero nigiwa giro Yesu mene Yudaya tawing doro kapetegairo Galilaya tawingna baungna ara.
43004004	Nagibo awiya Samaria tawing busero buwagairo bautunauna.
43004005	Yesu mene tawing awiya busero buwagairo bautunete Samaria napo zo yazo Saiko auna kasa yena ara. Napo awiya Yakobo mene mani nuna Yosepe eno tawing agewa pugaina auna nugu mitauna ara.
43004006	Nupema tawing auna atu Yakobora ou kote wamao zo mitauna. Arare Yesu nung atu kasa yenu wari diti 12 kilok yena ara. Ayenu nung putoung aung yenu giro ou kote wamao auna nugu atu aduna ara.
43004007	Adungno mitinu Samaria bauno zo ou dumari sero buna. Bunu Yesu mene giro nung eno eyero sena, “Ou piti minane.” Ayero sena ara.
43004008	Buro-mani nuna awong ma pumari sero nape bamuwa nung nata mitete bauno eno ou isa senu
43004009	bauno mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ning Yuda emo mene nono yero Samaria bauno na eno ou isa sinesi?” Ayero sena, noeno okowata Yuda emore Samaria emore awong kasugairo nasani nauwa, aeno bauno mene ge awiya sena.
43004010	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Nona Tuwa Bayau mene ning eno pugari siniya auna susuwa aune nupema na ou eno sinena auna susuwa dema gasa kasa yatiya, awiya ning ou eno na isa sasa nao me iwaing auna ou awiya ning eno pugatena.”
43004011	Ayero senu bauno mene ge abena eyero sena, “Ou kote ewiya tura daung ware, ning kopu ou dumao aung. Arare nao me iwaingna ou awiya natu pumarinesi?
43004012	Ewowo naname Yakobo nung ou kote ewiya wauna. Ayero yenu nung aune mani awiso nuna aune lama bulimakao aune awong apakana ou ewiya mininasani nauwa. Nung ou kote ewiya nae eno diriyegaina. Arata ning Yakobo daigatinesa, ayero sinesita?”
43004013	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Ou ewiya mininowa nupema ouwe mena yero noiya.
43004014	Arata ou nane pugarinena awiya zo mene minai ouwe nupema oko yariniya. Nane ou awiya emo zo eno pugana, dubo nuna-una atu ou diti ine yero gubigubi nasani mitariniya. Ayero nai emo amimene nao me iwaing puro nasani nariniya.”
43004015	Ayero senu bauno mene eyero sena, “Emo, ning ou awiya pugasa miniro ouwe oko nai nane. Ayero na ou eno be ozaung-zaung etu butunona awiya duwane.”
43004016	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Ning baungno emo nina puro nito dema baeto.”
43004017	Ayero senu bauno mene ge abena eyero sena, “Na emo aung.” Asenu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Ning emo nina aung sisa awiya me sinesa ara.
43004018	Ning emo wawong zo ayero atiro doro nosa. Arare be yeme ning emo zore nesa, arata nung awiya emo nina okowa, arare ning ge me sinesa.”
43004019	Ayero senu bauno mene eyero sena, “Emo, na yeme susuwa nina gosinena. Ning porofete me.
43004020	Arare se gane. Kikiyongne nanae awong diri euna atu augairo Tuwa Bayau bowi nasani nauwa, arata Yuda emo niye mene zo Yerusalem nape atu Tuwa Bayau bowi nasani nanenese sao mitiya ayero sero nowa.”
43004021	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Bauno, na ge sana nigasa me yaise. Be zo nugu niya. Be awiya kasa yai aune niye Mama bowi yari sero diri eunata Yerusalem nape atu oko yarineya.
43004022	Niye awiya oko giro baingtao nasani bowi nowa. Nanae mene zo giro baingtiti nasani bowi nonane. Noeno okowata, korayao iwaing yao awiya Yudara-una atu gitau kasa yaise sao mitiya.
43004023	Be zo bariniya, be aune Tuwa Bayaura emo dubu me mene nung bowi yari sero ititire nao mere mene yarineya. Mama nung emo ayao mene nung bowi yaese arataungno yero noiya.
43004024	Tuwa Bayau nung taung aingso okowata, nung ititi. Arare niye nung bowi yari sero taung mene okowata, ititire nao mere mene nung bowi nasani neupu.”
43004025	Ayero senu bauno amimene ge abena eyero sena, “Na gosinena, Mesia yazo nuna zo Kristo amimene bariniya. Nung buro nona apakana pu daung gariniya.”
43004026	Ayero senu Yesu mene nuna bera puro eyero sena, “Ge sinesa awiya mani zo oko mitiya. Na gege ara. Na ning aune dema ge sinena, naka kerauwa.”
43004027	Ge ayero sinenu buro-mani kasa yero nung baunone dema ge ungwe newato awiya giro wawong di gamuwa ara. Arata susuwa no eno bauno eno ge siniye, o nono yero siniye, ayero sero atata yaora awiya gigiwa teng oko yenu giro duwa ara.
43004028	Ayero yewa bauno nung kopu ou dumao nuna doro sungno baung nape yero emo bauno eno eyero sena,
43004029	“Niye bungpu. Baungno emo zo gae. Nune nao nana-una susuwa apakana na eno keregaiya. Nung Kristo, ta?”
43004030	Ayero senu awong kara Yesu gari bamuwa.
43004031	Awong Yesura-una butunewa buro-mani nuna mene Yesu eno eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, ning nona mini.”
43004032	Ayero sewa ge abena eyero sena, “Ma nana mitiya. Awiya niye oko gosineya.”
43004033	Ayero senu buro-mani nuna mene awong nuka nuyetope wina-se yero eyero sewa, “Awe mene ma puro bumiye?”
43004034	Ayero sewa giro nung eyero sena, “Nung na iyengtinu bumuwang auna be diungno buro nuna yero bautunete besugarinena amimene ma nana niya arauwa.
43004035	Niye nika niyetope eyero sero nowa, ‘Ino siwongpatige ayao aung yai aune ma me yariniya.’ Ayero sinowa, arata nane mene zo eyero sinena. Niye diti-dati yero buro gipu. Ma pumaora be kasa yero mitiya.
43004036	Emo zo nung ma puro pu dekaongna gao buro yero noiya amimene zuma pupunoiya. Nung ma zo nao me iwaingna gerao awiya pu gare gatinoiya. Arare emo ma urao emo arita emo ma pumao emo awongto amimene dema yawa yawa yarineyato.
43004037	Arare ge eyero sinonane amimene etu me yariniya, ‘Zo mene uraora buro noiya, arata zo mene pumaora buro noiya.’
43004038	Ma niye oko urao yewa auna me awiya pu gare gaese sesena babarineya. Buro awiya ena mene yewa auna me niye pupuneya.” Ayero sena ara.
43004039	Samaria emo bauno daigairo mene baunona ge nigiro Yesu tumo diwa ara. Ayero yewa, noeno okowata, bauno mene nao nuna-una susuwa awiya apakana Yesu mene keregainu giro emo bauno eno susuware senu nigiwa.
43004040	Arare awong Yesura-una buro Yesu awong aune dema naise yuno puro baung nape yari sewa giro Yesu mene awong aune dema wari be etobe nauna ara.
43004041	Atu ge tugata nasani nenu emo bauno daigairo mene ge nuna nigiro nung tumo diwa.
43004042	Ayero yero bauno eno eyero sewa, “Gitau nae ungwe nina nigiro nung tumo diyenane. Arata yeme ewiya nae be-giti nuna-una atu ge nigiro eyero sinenane: Nung tawing sero sero auna emo bauno auna Korayao Emo me.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
43004043	Yesu nung Samaria emo bauno aune dema be etobe mitete awong doro Galilaya tawingna baungna.
43004044	Yesu nung ge gitau eyero sena, “Porofete awong napo nunae-una kasa yero emo yazore oko yero nowa.”
43004045	Arare Yesu mene Galilaya tawingna baungno kasa yenu Galilaya emo nung giro arugairo yawa yawa yewa. Awiya noeno okowata, be zore awong baung Yerusalem yero Yuda emora iya dang auna atu buro Yesu mene yena awiya gigiwa.
43004046	Yesu mene Galilaya tawingna kasa yero Kena nape baungna. Napo auna atu nung gitau senu ou mene wain yena. Atu baungnu, Kapaneam napo auna diya emo baina zo nasani nauna auna mani yaya mouyao puro mitina.
43004047	Arare “Yesu nung Yudaya tawing doro yesese yero bung Galilaya tawingna niya” ayero sewa giro diya emo amimene baung Kena nape yero Yesura-una baungna ara. Baungno mani nuna magayari sero nasani nenu giro Yesu yuno puro gare baungno mani nuna kora yaise sena.
43004048	Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Niye tani putoungne ena aune buro baina ena awiya oko gao yarineya, awiya niye na oko tumo diyarineya.”
43004049	Ayero senu diya emo mene eyero sena, “O Tuwa, mani nana magayoiye sero, mena babasese sinena.”
43004050	Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno eyero sena, “Ning teba baung. Mani nina iwaing yetiya arauwa.” Ayero senu diya emo nung Yesura ge niginu me yenu giro baungna ara.
43004051	Yesese yero bautu nenu soumani nuna ena mene bowi puro buro nung taungno eyero sewa, “Mani nina iwaing yero niya.”
43004052	Ayero sewa giro mani iwaing yena auna wari diti be awiya gari sero atata yenu sewa, “Sipe wari diti towang dopero mitesesi aune taung kokoni yao nuna aung yetiya.”
43004053	Ayero sewa diya emo mene susuwa eyero gigina: Be aune Yesu mene na yesese yanese sero eyero sesiya, “Mani nina iwaing yetiya.” Arare diya emo mene susuwa awiya giro nung arore awisore Yesu tumo diwa arauwa.
43004054	Yesu tani yena, awiya nung Yudaya tawingna atu yesese yero buro Galilaya tawingna kasa yero aune tani awiya yena, awiya tani putoungne namba tu Galilaya atu yena arauwa.
43005001	Yuda emora iya dang auna be bunu Yesu nung witiro baung Yerusalem yena ara.
43005002	Goma napo Yerusalem zimao auna towaora be zo yazo nuna Lama Towao be. Towao be auna atu ou ubutu zo mitauna yazo nuna Yuda gera Betesida. Ou auna deung bera atu bisi paora garo wawong zo mitauna.
43005003	Garo auna emo yayare witao amimene apepegairo mitauwa. Emo ena diti guma yao, o ena te amao, o ena yu soyao daigairo mene atu mitauwa. [Awong ou kapu yai gari diya mitauwa.
43005004	Atu mitauwa be ena Tuwa Bayaura angelo zo mene wosiro ou ubutu awiya dedunaunu kapu naunu yaya emora-una atu zo mene gitau gitau yero wosi oura yero gutero yaya nuna mena aung naunu iwaing yero nasani nauwa.]
43005005	Arare emo zo nung asama yero mitawe dunu dawang 38 aung yena amimene atu mitina.
43005006	Yesu mene emo awiya giro yaya nuna nimoi-namoi mitauna awiya giro nung eno eyero sena, “Ning iwaing yari kotupunesita?”
43005007	Ayero senu emo asama amimene abena eyero sena, “O emo, ou kapu noi aune awe mene naka wawong iniro pumai wosiro ou awiya gutero iwaing yateni? Ena mene na daigairo wosi oura yero nowa giro na mitima nona.”
43005008	Ayero senu Yesu mene nung eno abena eyero sena, “Ning iropuro awao masi nina puro angye.”
43005009	Ayero senu emo asama awiya taung iwaing yenu nung iropuro masi nuna puro angyena ara. Wari be awiya Yuda emora Sabat iya dang mitiwa ara.
43005010	Arare Yuda emo mene emo iwaing yena aeno eyero sewa, “Iya be dang euna sao tauyao ge naname mitiya awiya ning noeno daigati nasani awao masi nina puro nesi?”
43005011	Ayero sewa nung ge abena eyero sena, “Na kora yetiya emo amimene eyero sesiya, ‘Masi nina puro angye.’”
43005012	Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Masi nina puro angye, awiya emo yazo awe mene sesiye?”
43005013	Ayero sewa emo senu iwaing yena amimene Yesura yazo kauyena. Noeno okowata, Yesu nung emo dubu dopero mitiwa auna towang atu saingtiro baungna ara.
43005014	Ago Yesu mene emo awiya Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana atu taungno eyero sena, “Ning taung nina iwaing yetiya, arata mou yao zo nina-una kasa yoiye sero, pasena doro neu.”
43005015	Ayero senu nung Yesu giro baingtiro baungno Yuda emo eno eyero sena, “Emo na kora yetiya awiya yazo nuna Yesu.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43005016	Yesu nung Sabat iya dang aune buro ayero nasani nauna, arare Yuda emo mene giro nung iwo yewa ara.
43005017	Ayero yewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Mama nana nung buro yao gege nasani noiya, arare na deka ayero buro nona.” Ayero sena ara.
43005018	Yesu nung Sabat iya dang sisigaina, nupema Tuwa Bayau nung Maung nuka nuna asinasani nung Tuwa Bayau ine ayero sena. Asenu Yuda emo mene gigiwa meko yenu giro awong nung dari sero nagibo tamari yewa.
43005019	Ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana nigipu. Na Mani mene kotumao nana-una gege buro oko yero nona. Mama nana mene noiya a giro yero nona. Mama mene noi giro na Mani mene deka ayero yero nona.
43005020	Mama nung na Mani nuna ewiya giro ara bainakama tapunoiya, arare buro noiya awiya teng gipinoiya. Arata buro ewiya gege okowata, buro witao ena mitiya awiya dema Mani eno gipai giro niye yangka sero wawong di gamarineya ara.
43005021	Mama nung emo magayao uwinoi seka yero nowa deka ayero na Mani mene aratamao nana-una zota zo awiya uwana seka yarineya ara.
43005022	Mama nung emo zaz oko noiya. Buro awiya apakana Maina waweng pugaina ara.
43005023	Arare emo awong Mama bowi yero nowa, deka ayero Mani bowi yaese. Zo nung Mani oko bowi yao yariniya amimene Mama na iyengtina awiya dema oko bowi yao noiya ayero yariniya.
43005024	Na memokoba sana nigipu. Zo nung ge nana nigiti nasani Mama nana na iyengtina auna ge nigitiniya amimene nao me iwaing yeme eune puro niya. Nung kotora atu oko zuwari niya. Nung tauyero magayao doro naora kasa yero noiya.
43005025	Na memokoba sana nigipu. Be zo kasa yariniya — erawa mena kasa yero mitiya era — be aune mamagayao mene yaine nowa amimene Tuwa Bayaura Mani auna ge bewing nigarineya. Ena mene ge nigiro baingtiro seka yero narineya.
43005026	Mama nung naora Maung, arare nung na Mani nuna eno nao diriyegainu na naora Maung yero nona.
43005027	Na Mani, na Emora Mani. Arare Mama nana mene emora koto auna zaz buro awiya na Mamana bera yanese sero putoung na eno pugaina.
43005028	Niye ge awiya nigiro oko wawong di gamae. Noeno okowata, be zo pugao mitiya awiya kasa yai aune mamagayao biritira atu awinowa amimene wawa nana nigarineya.
43005029	Ayero nigiro iwaing nasani nauwa amimene iropuro nao me iwaing tamarineya. Arata meko yero nasani nauwa amimene zo iropuro koto yero kotora atu zuwarineya ara.
43005030	Na dubo nana-una buro zo yao ine oko mitiya. Na ge Mama nana-una bera atu nigitinona deka ayero nasani kotora zaz yero nona ara. Ayero nasani kotora zaz buro yana teng yariniya. Noeno okowata, na aratamao nana-una okowata, nung na senu wosiwang auna aratamao ago yari yero nona ara.
43005031	Na natope susuwa nana sana teng oko yariniya.
43005032	Susuwa nana awiya zo mene keregatinoiya. Nung susuwa nana keregati nasani ge me siniya awiya gosinena.
43005033	Niye seseya buro-mani ninae mene Yohanena-una baungno atata yewa nung ge me keregairo sena ara.
43005034	Emo zo mene susuwa nana keregaise awiya oko aratapunena. Niye susuwa nana nigaya Tuwa Bayau mene niye sorero pumaise sero niye eno sesena ara.
43005035	Yohane nung waegao bainakama ine yero nasani niye waegaina. Waegao nuna giro be apungkaka gege yawa yawa nasani nauwa ara.
43005036	Arata susuwa nana keregatinoiya amimene nung Yohane ine okowata. Nung witao. Buro Mama mene yanese sena awiya yero nona. Buro amimene susuwa nana eyero keregatinoiya: Mama mene senu wosiwang arauwa.
43005037	Nupema Mama na senu wosiwang amimene susuwa nana keregatinoiya. Niye be nuna-una ge oko nigao yero nowa. Niye diti moko nuna oko gao yero nowa.
43005038	Ge nuna dubo ninae-una oko mitoiya. Noeno okowata, niye Mama na senu wosiwang auna ge nigitinowa me oko yero noiya.
43005039	Niye eyero sero nowa, ‘Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao amimene nao me iwaing name eno pugariniya.’ Ayero sinasani nao me iwaing tamari sero ge gayao zazagati nasani nowa. Ge gayao amimene susuwa nana keregatinoiya,
43005040	arata niye na nao me iwaing niye eno puganese sero na aune dema tayao awang sinowa.
43005041	Emo mene na bowi yaese oko sinona.
43005042	Na susuwa ninae gosinona. Dubo ninae zo Tuwa Bayau Mama nana auna-una oko mitoiya.
43005043	Na Mama nana-una ge diungno ninae-una wosiwang, arata niye ge nana doro na oko otao yero nowa. Nete emo zo kotumao nuna-una kasa ninae-una yai aune nung aune dema otao yarineya.
43005044	Niye niyetope bowi wina-ye nasani nowa. Arata Tuwa Bayau nata niye bowi yaise ayero oko sao yero nowa amimene nono yero na tumo diyarinei?
43005045	Niye na eno eyero oko sepu, ‘Nune name gera pugai ge buro yarinenane.’ Na eno ayero oko sepu. Niye Mose tumo diro yero nowa, arare Mose mene niye gera pugariniya.
43005046	Mose mene ge gaena, awiya na eno gaena ara. Niye ge nuna nigaya me yatiya, awiya niye ge nana dema nigaya me yatiya.
43005047	Arata niye Mosera ge gayao awiya nigiwa me oko yao yenu giro dewa, arare nono yero ge nana nigaya me yariniye?” Yesu mene ayero sena arauwa.
43006001	Yesu mene ge awiya senu aung yenu aune Galilaya ou nazi buwagairo baung enabara yena ara. Ou nazi auna yazo zo Taibirias asinowa.
43006002	Buwagairo baungnu emo bauno yayare kora naunu iwaing nauwa awiya ena mene gosinauwa, arare emo bauno dubu bainane mene nung ago yewa arauwa.
43006003	Ayero yewa Yesu mene buro-mani nuna puro witi diri yero adungno mitiwa ara.
43006004	Be auna atu Yuda emora iya dang zo yazo nuna Magayao mene awong Daigaina auna be nugu yena ara.
43006005	Arare Yesu mene emo bauno dubu baina nuna-una butunewa giro Filip atata yero eyero sena, “Ma naina atu puro emo bauno dubu baina aeno puganane minaya teng yariniye?”
43006006	Yesu nung buro zo yari kotupunena, arata nung Filip gaero gari atata yero sena ara.
43006007	Ayero senu Filip mene eyero sena, “500 kina mene ma puro puganane minaya teng oko yarinita, nowa.”
43006008	Ayero senu buro-mani nuna zo Anderea, nung Simon Petorora meta, amimene eyero sena,
43006009	“Mani zo mene ma wawong zore ou wo etore puro niya. Arata emo bauno dubu baina, arare teng oko yarinita, nowa.”
43006010	Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Niye sepu emo bauno au dekaongna gairo adumae.” Ayero senu giro awong sewa tawing auna yowangze mitina awiya isiyero adumuwa. Zare nunae awiya emo 5,000 ayao ine amimene adumuwa ara.
43006011	Ayero yewa Yesu mene ma puro Tuwa Bayau eno dange sero emo bauno adungno mitiwa aeno bono yena. Ou wo deka ayero yenu teng yena.
43006012	Miniwa teng yenu itoto duwa giro Yesu mene buro-mani nuna eno eyero sena, “Nona itoto mitete meko yariniya, aeno yangtagaipu.” Ayero sena ara.
43006013	Asenu ma wawong zo miniwa auna itoto awiya yangtagaiwa saka 12 ayao be buna.
43006014	Emo mene tani putoungne awiya giro Yesu bowi nasani eyero sewa, “Porofete bainakama zo tawingna etu kasa yaise sao awiya era.”
43006015	Ayero sero Yesu puro emo tuwa nunae pugaya naise sinewa giro nung emo dubu awiya doro nata witiro baung diri yena arauwa.
43006016	Ture inu buro-mani nuna mene ou nazira wosiro
43006017	Kapaneam nape yesese yero babari sero wangna witiro bamuwa ara. Ayero bautunewa ping inu Yesu mene nunae-una oko kasa yao yenu
43006018	bisi tauyao nibamu bunu kakawa bainakama denu
43006019	awong dawero baung towang yero 5 kilomita ayao newa aune Yesu mene ou tame atu ang yero baungno wang nunae-una nugu kasa nenu giro awang yewa ara.
43006020	Awang yewa giro Yesu mene eyero sena, “Awang oko yae. Nane butunena arauwa.”
43006021	Ayero senu giro awong yawa yawa nasani nung iniwa wangna witinu aune awong napo babari sero newa auna mena kasa yewa arauwa.
43006022	Iya gainu emo bauno ou nazi enabara awinewa amimene eyero sewa, “Pingne wang dekaongka gege miti buro-mani nuna mene Yesu doro awong nata wangna witiro babeya ara.”
43006023	Ayero sewa, arata wang ena Taibirias nape atu buro kakamo Tuwa mene ma gao yenu miniwa auna bumuwa ara.
43006024	Arare emo bauno mene Yesu buro-mani nuna aune awiya kau nete awong tamari sero wang buro mitiwa auna witiro baung Kapaneam nape yewa arauwa.
43006025	Baung ou enabara yero Yesu kau nete taungno eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, ning nazi besi?”
43006026	Ayero atata yewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana nigipu. Tani putoungne nona gosinowa aeno okowata, ma pugena mineya aeno gege na tamari sero kau neya.
43006027	Niye ma zo mitima mena aung noiya aeno okowata, nao me iwaingna ma auna buro yepu. Na Emora Mani awiya Tuwa Bayau Mama mene putoung na eno pugainu pumuwang. Arare nao iwaingna ma awiya nane niye eno pugarinena.”
43006028	Ayero senu awong ge abena eyero sewa, “Nae nono yero Tuwa Bayaura buro yarinenine?”
43006029	Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Tuwa Bayaura buro eyao era. Na Tuwa Bayau mene senu wosiwang na awiya tumo dipu.”
43006030	Ayero senu awong ge abena eyero sewa, “Ning tani putoungne no yasa ganane ge nina me yari niye?
43006031	Aya ewowo nanae eu yanawira atu nasani ma yazo mana awiya mininasani nauwa. Auna ge gayao eyero mitiya era: ‘Uritira ma pugati naunu mininauwa.’”
43006032	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana nigipu. Mose nung uritira ma niye eno oko pugaina. Mama nana mene uritira ma me niye eno pugatinoiya ara.
43006033	Ma Tuwa Bayau mene pugatinoiya amimene uritira atu wosiro tawingna emo bauno niye eno nao tapunoiya.”
43006034	Ayero senu abena eyero sewa, “O Tuwa, ning ma sinesa awiya be giti nae eno pugairo neu.”
43006035	Ayero sewa abena eyero sena, “Nao pugaora ma na era. Zo nung na aune dema tairo nariniya amimene meri oko nariniya. Zo nung na tumo diyariniya amimene ouwe oko yariniya.
43006036	Na sesena gigeya. Niye na gosinowa, arata niye na oko tumo diyao yero nowa.
43006037	Emo bauno Mama mene na eno pugatinoiya amimene apakana nana-una kasa yarineya. Zo nung nana-una bai na nung oko awang sarinena.
43006038	Uritira atu wosiwang awiya kotumao nana-una okowata, Mamana bera buro nuna yari sero wosiwang ara.
43006039	Nung senu wosiwang auna aratamao eyao era: Emo bauno dubu na eno pugaina awong awiya sisigairo meko yowi sero, be bainana atu awong uwana apakana iropaese.
43006040	Mama nana-una aratamao awiya eyero mitiya era: Awong na Mani giro baingtiro tumo diyari neya amimene nao me iwaing pumarineya. Ayero yaya nane be bainana atu awong uwana iroparineya. Mama nana-una aratamao ayero mitiya arauwa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43006041	Yesu mene “Ma uritira atu wosina awiya na ara,” ayero sena. Asenu Yuda emo gigiwa meko yenu giro eyero sewa,
43006042	“Emo awiya nung Yesu. Nung Yosefera mani arauwa. Name ai maungne nuna gosinenane. Arare noeno nung uritira atu wosinu siya ayero siniye?”
43006043	Ayero sewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Niye gugumama oko sepu.
43006044	Zo nung kotumao nuna-una gege nana-una bao auna yani oko mitiya. Mama na senu wosiwang amimene nung watimariniya, ami zo nung nana-una bariniya. Ayero yai nane be bainana atu uwana seka yero iropariniya.
43006045	Porofete mene ge zo eyero gaewa mitoiya era: ‘Tuwa Bayau nung nutope emo apakana ge nuna tugata yariniya.’ Arare zo nung Mama mene ge gipai nigiro kotumao tamariniya amimene nana-una bariniya.
43006046	Emo awe mene Mama gigine? Aung arauwa. Tuwa Bayaura-una atu wosiwang na dekaongka amimene Mama gigiwang ara.
43006047	Na memokoba sana nigipu. Zo nung na tumo didinasani noiya amimene nao me iwaing awiya puro noiya ara.
43006048	Naora ma na era.
43006049	Aya ewowo ninae eu yanawira atu nasani ma yazo mana mininasani nawe mamagayewa.
43006050	Arata uritira ma miniro oko magayao nao gege nao awiya na era.
43006051	Naora ma uritira atu wosina awiya na era. Arare zo nung ma awiya miniro nao gege nariniya. Goi nana mene ma niya ara. Arare emo bauno mene nao tamaese pugarinena.”
43006052	Ayero senu Yuda emo nuka nuyetope wina-se yero eyero sewa, “Nung nono yero goi nuna pugai minanenese siniye?”
43006053	Ayero sewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na meba sinena. Niye Emora Mani auna goire yure oko minao yarineya, awiya nao me dubo ninae-una oko mitariniya.
43006054	Zo nung goi nana aune yu nana aune minariniya amimene nao me iwaing tamariniya. Ayero yai nane be bainana atu nung uwarinena ara.
43006055	Goi nana mene ma me. Yu nana mene ou minao me.
43006056	Goi nana aune yu nana aune minariniya amimene na aune dema nariniya. Ayero yai na deka ayero nung aune dema narinena.
43006057	Mama nung naora Maung amimene na senu wosiwang, arare nao nana awiya Mamana-una tauyao mitoi nona. Arare zo nung na minariniya awiya deka ayero nao nuna nana-una mitai nariniya.
43006058	Uritira ma auna susuwa ayao mitiya ara. Awiya aya ewowo ninae mene miniwa, ayao ine okowata. Awong ma awiya mininasani mamagayewa. Arata zo mene ma ewiya minariniya amimene nao gege nariniya.” Ayero sena ara.
43006059	Yesu nung Kapaneam nape atu yere ibura atu ge awiya awong eno tugata yena arauwa.
43006060	Dubu nuna-una ena mene ge awiya nigiro eyero sewa, “Ge awiya nigenane teng oko niya. Ge awiya awe mene nigai teng yariniye?”
43006061	Ayero sinasani dubo tu mene gugumama gagumama sinewa Yesu mene mena yetine yero giro eyero sena, “Ge awiya nigeya meko nita?
43006062	Arare na Emora Mani mene nupema kapetegairo uritira witana gaya nono yariniye?
43006063	Oweno mene nao emo bauno eno pugatinoiya. Taungna goi mene oko sorepunoiya. Na ge sinona awiya Owenone arita naore ara.
43006064	Arata niye zo nigiro na tumo oko diyao yero nowa.” Yesu mene ayero sena. Noeno okowata, nung awong ena mene ge nuna nigiro nung tumo oko diyao yarineya auna benaung nunae gitau otu mena giginu aung yena ara. Arita emo nung keregari nauna auna benaung dema mena giginu aung yena. Aeno ge awiya sena ara.
43006065	Arare nung ge zo susuuno eyero sena, “Na aeno eyero sinena era. Zo nung Mama mene oko soremao yai nana-una bao auna yani oko mitiya.” Ayero sena ara.
43006066	Arare be auna atu dubu nung ago nauwa auna ena mene nung aune dema nao awiya bereya yenu nung doro bamuwa ara.
43006067	Ayero yewa Yesu mene buro-mani 12 atata yero eyero sena, “Niye deka ayero na duwari kotupuneita?”
43006068	Ayero senu Simon Petoro mene abena eyero sena, “Tuwa, ning doro zo ana-una babari nenine? Nao me iwaing auna ge nina-una mitoiya.
43006069	Arare nae ning tumo didinasani eyero gigenane me yetiya: Ning Tuwa Bayaura Mani dang.”
43006070	Ayero senu Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na niye buro-mani 12 yangtagairo pumuwang. Arata ninae-una zo mene nono yero Sanda ine yero niye?”
43006071	Ayero sena, awiya nung Simon Iskeriot auna mani yazo Yudas aeno sena. Nung Yesura buro-mani 12 auna otao zo amimene nawe Yesu keregairo iwora waweng pugaina.
43007001	Yesu mene ayero senu giro Yuda emo ena mene Yesu dari sero opene ge diwa tauyenu Yesu mene ge awiya nigiro giro Yudaya tawing doro Galilaya tawingna gege atu buro baungno nasani nauna ara.
43007002	Ayero nenu Yuda emora iya dang zo yazo nuna Koubogara Iya Dang auna be nugu yena ara.
43007003	Ayero yenu metamani nuna mene nung eno eyero sewa, “Ning tawing ewiya doro Yudaya tawingna baungno tani ena yero nosa awiya otu yasa emo bauno ning ago yero nowa amimene gae.
43007004	Zo nung emo baina yari kotupunoiya amimene buro nuna oko puingnoiya. Arare ning buro me iwaing yero nasani giro baungno emo bauno apakana auna benaungna atu ye gae.” Ayero sewa ara.
43007005	Metamani nuna mene ge ayero sewa, noeno okowata, awong nung tumo oko diyao nasani nauwa.
43007006	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Be nana oko bao. Niye zo be aung buro gege yero nowa teng yero noiya.
43007007	Emo bauno mene niye iwo yao ine teng oko. Arata nane mene zo nao nunae meko awiya keregatinona giro na iwo yero nowa.
43007008	Niye augaora baungpu. Nane zo augao auna oko babari nena. Noeno okowata, be nana oko kasa yao.”
43007009	Ayero sero nung Galilaya tawingna kaatu mitinu
43007010	awong gitau bautunewa aune nung nata opene ago baungna ara.
43007011	Ayero yenu iya dang be nugu yenu Yuda emo babuze amimene nung kau nasani eyero sewa, “Nung natu mitiye?” Ayero sinewa
43007012	aune emo dubu baina amimene ge daigairo sinasani ena mene eyero sewa, “Nung emo iwaing.” Asinewa ena mene eyero sewa, “Aungwa. Nung ge iwi nasani emo bauno etegati noiya.” Ayero sewa ara.
43007013	Arata dubu baina mene Yuda emo babuze awiya awang nasani ge bautara sewa arauwa.
43007014	Iya be dang towang daung yenu Yesu mene Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana mokora toiro emo bauno ge tugata yena.
43007015	Ge tugata nenu Yuda emora gitau yao mene giro wawong di gauno eyero sewa, “Nung nigao garo naname-una oko towao amimene nono yero ge susuware nigine?”
43007016	Ayero sewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na gera susuwa niye eno tugata yero nona, awiya nana okowata, na senu wosiwang auna arauwa.
43007017	Niye na kotumao nana-una gege ge tugata yero nonita Tuwa Bayaura bera ge tugata yero noni, ayero sinowa. Arata emo zo mene Tuwa Bayaura ge dipunasani nariniya amimene na ge sinona auna susuwa gariniya.
43007018	Emo zo nung kotumao nuna-una ge tugata yero noiya amimene taung nuna puro witari sero noiya. Arata emo zo nung buro burora maung auna bowi kasa yaise sinoiya amimene ge iwao aung ge me gege sinoiya.
43007019	Mose mene sao tauyao ge gaero niye eno pugaina, arata ninae-una zo mene oko dipunoiya. Arare noeno na dari sinei?”
43007020	Ayero senu emo bauno amimene girara sero eyero sewa, “Ning iwae mene dubo nina-una miti dau nasani sinesa. Awe mene ning dari siniye?”
43007021	Ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na tani putoungne dekaongka yewang niye giro wawong di gauno kotupu nasani mitowa ara.
43007022	Sana nigipu. Mose mene mani emodidi ninae-una taung aingso agewa kapaese sena. Awiya Mose mene okowata, aya ewowo ninae mene zayewa ara. Arare buro awiya yaora be butunoi Sabat iya auna atu yero nowa.
43007023	Awiya Mosera sao tauyao ge daigowi sero niye Sabat iya auna atu mani emodidi ninae auna taung aingso kapero nowa. Arata nane mene zo emo zora taung aingso zere tutupore awiya Sabat iya auna atu kora yewang. Aune niye noeno na eno tini kapao pupunei?
43007024	Na pasena yaine yewang asero buro nana meko oko sae. Buro nana-una susuwa giro baingtiro aune buro iwaing ta meko ing, awiya sepu.”
43007025	Ge ayero senu Yerusalemna emo bauno ena mene eyero sewa, “Emo dari sinowa awiya era.
43007026	Gipu. Nung awong eno ge benaungna atu pasero siniya, arata awong nung eno ge zo oko sao neya. Pirisa awong nung gosinowa Kristo yero noita? Aungta nowa.
43007027	Name kasayao nuna gosinenane. Arata Kristo bariniya auna kasa yao awiya zo mene oko gariniya.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
43007028	Yesu nung Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana atu dopero ge tugata nenu ge awiya sewa nigiro abena eyero sena, “Niye na gosinowa, nupema kasayao nana-una susuwa gosinowa. Arata na kotumao nana-una oko wosiwang. Nung na senu wosiwang awiya me ara. Niye nung oko gosinowa.
43007029	Na nuna-una atu wosiwang, nupema nune senu wosiwang, arare na nung giro baingtitinona.” Ayero sena ara.
43007030	Ayero senu awong nung bunari sewa, arata be nuna oko bao, arare wawong nuna-una tame pugao awiya mou yero duwa ara.
43007031	Ayero yewa emo bauno daigairo mene Yesu tumo diro eyero sewa, “Kristo bariniya awiya emo emimene tani putoungne yero noiya awiya daigairo yarinita? Aungta nowa.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
43007032	Emo bauno awong ge ayero opene sinewa Farisayo mene nigiro pirisa babuze enane dema augairo Yesu bunari sero ge sinete gorobo emo iyengtiwa Yesu pari sero bamuwa arauwa.
43007033	Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na be apungka gege niye aune dema nete nung na senu bumuwang auna-una kapete garinena ara.
43007034	Ayero yana niye na kauyao buro bainakama yero oko tamari neya. Baungno narinena auna niye babao ine teng oko ara.”
43007035	Ge ayero senu Yuda emo nuka nuyetope ge wina-se yero eyero sewa, “Nung natu babai kau yanenese siniye? Yuda emo otao mani naname Grik tawingna atu nowa auna-una baungno Grik emo ge tugata yari sinita?
43007036	Nung eyero sesiya, ‘Na kau yero oko tamarineya. Nupema babarinena auna niye babao ine teng oko.’ Noeno ge ayero siniye?” Ayero sewa arauwa.
43007037	Iya dang awiya besugatinenu Yuda emo awong augairo mitiwa aune Yesu mene iropuro dopero wawa sero eyero sena, “Zo nung ouwe yai giro nana-una buro ou minaise.
43007038	Auna ge gayao zo eyero mitiya, ‘Zo nung na tumo diyariniya auna dubora atu nao me iwaing auna ou sasa ine bao gege butunasani mitariniya.’” Ayero sena ara.
43007039	Awiya emo nung tumo didinowa amimene Oweno pumarineya amaze ayero sena. Yesu mene Owenona ge awiya oura pugairo ge awiya sena. Be auna atu nung uritira waegaora oko kapetegairo witao yena, arare Oweno mene oko wosao yena.
43007040	Emo bauno awong ge awiya nigiro eyero sewa, “Porofete diya yero nonane nung ara.”
43007041	Ayero sinewa ena mene zo eyero sewa, “Nung Kristo me.” Ayero sewa ena mene enana ge dero eyero sewa, “Kristo mene Galilaya atu nono yero kasa yariniye? Aungta nowa.
43007042	Tuwa Bayaura ge gayao zo eyero mitiya era: ‘Kristo nung Dawidira napo susuwa Betelehem atu saisibuna nuna-una towang atu kasa yaise sao.’ Ge gayao ayero mitiya.” Ayero sewa arauwa.
43007043	Emo awong Yesura ge ayero sinasani dubu sero gagausewa ara.
43007044	Ayero nasani ena mene Yesu bunari ge sewa, arata nung zo za oko iniwa.
43007045	Gorobo emo awong pirisa babuzere Farisayora-una kapetegairo bamuwa awong atata yero eyero sewa, “Niye noeno nung oko puro bao yetei?”
43007046	Ayero atata yewa gorobo emo mene eyero sewa, “Nung emo ge iwawaing sinowa awiya daigairo ge iwaing-kawaing nibamu sesiya aeno nae nung oko pumao dotenane.”
43007047	Ayero sewa Farisayo emo mene abena eyero sewa, “Nung niye dema etegai gigeya me yetiya.
43007048	Simai Farisayore nanae-una awe mene nung tumo didinoiye?
43007049	Awiya aung ara. Arata emo bauno dubu baina nung ago neya amimene Mosera sao tauyao ge oko gao nasani nowa, arare waru nunae-una mitoiya.”
43007050	Ayero sewa otao nunae zo yazo nuna Nikodema nung gitau be zo Yesura-una baungna amimene eyero sena,
43007051	“Niye sepu. Emo zo name susuwa nuna oko gao, arita pasena nuna oko tamao nasani nung tebeba gera puganenese sao mitita? Sao tauyao naname mene ayero yanenese sinita?”
43007052	Ayero senu otao mani nuna mene abena eyero sewa, “Ning deka Galilaya emo ing? Ning sao tauyao ge naname zazagao buro yero bautu nete eyero garinesa: Galilaya tawingna atu porofete zo kasa yaise sao oko mitiya.”
43007053	[Ge ayero sinete doro soma sero zanero bamuwa arauwa.
43008001	Yesu nung Oliwa diri witiro
43008002	atu mitinu iya gainu atu yesese yero baungno Tuwa Bayaura ibu bainana toinu emo bauno daigairo mene nuna-una buro augaiwa giro adungno ge tugata yena.
43008003	Ayero nenu sao tauyao ge gipao emo aune Farisayo awong amimene bauno zo kuma nenu tamuwa awiya puro pu towang gairo Yesu eno eyero sewa,
43008004	“Gipao emo, bauno emimene kuma ni tameya.
43008005	Mose mene sao tauyao ge naname gainasani bauno eyao ine awiya daba mene danane magayaese sena. Arata ning nitope nono yanenese kotupunesi?”
43008006	Ayero sewa, awiya noeno oko, awong nung atata yaya abena ge zo sai giro nung puro gera pugari aeno sewa. Ayero sewa Yesu nung awong eno ge abena oko sao. Nung utero tawingna atu owe nasani mitina.
43008007	Ayero yenu awong nung atata yerota yero ayewa giro zutiyero eyero sena, “Ninae-una zo pasena aung noiya amimene daba puro zayero daise aune dae.”
43008008	Ayero sero nupema utero tawingna atu owe susuuno nena.
43008009	Ayero nenu awong ge nuna nigiro bauno awiya doro babuze mene gitau yewa tiri-tara yero baungno aung yewa ara.
43008010	Ayero yewa bauno nata mitinu Yesu diti yero giro nung eno eyero sena, “Awong naiye? Zo mene ning gera pugaita?”
43008011	Ayero senu bauno mene abena eyero sena, “O Tuwa, aung ara.” Ayero senu Yesu mene eyero sena, “Na deka ayero ning gera oko pugatinena. Ning baungno nasani pasena nupema oko yase.” Ayero sena arauwa.]
43008012	Yesu mene emo bauno eno ge zo eyero sena, “Na tawing sero sero auna waegao. Arare zo nung na ago yariniya amimene mumena oko bautu nariniya. Nung naora waegao nuna-una mitai nariniya arauwa.”
43008013	Ayero senu Farisayo emo mene eyero sewa, “Ning nitope susuwa nina keregatinesa, awiya gosinenane me oko yero niya.”
43008014	Ayero sewa giro Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na natope susuwa nana keregatinena amimene me aung oko yero niya. Na natu bumuwing arita natu bautuneni, auna susuwa gosinasani aune ge sinona. Arata ninae mene zo na natu bumuwing arita natu bautuneni, auna susuwa kauyero nowa ara.
43008015	Niye taung nana gege giro na zaz yero nowa. Arata nane mene zo zaz yaora buro oko yero nona.
43008016	Arata na zaz yaora buro yatena, awiya buro me yatiya. Noeno okowata, na nata oko mitena. Nung na senu wosiwang amimene na aune dema noiya.
43008017	Sao tauyao ge gayao ninae auna atu ge eyero mitiya, ‘Emo etobe mene nona zora susuwa sayato teng yariniya. Ayero yai me ayero sarineya.’
43008018	Arare na susuwa nana natope keregairo nona aune Mama na senu wosiwang amimene dema keregatinoiya.”
43008019	Ayero senu awong nung atata yero eyero sewa, “Maung nina naiye?” Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Niye na oko giro baingtao yero nowa. Arare niye Mama nana deka ayero oko giro baingtao yero nowa. Niye na giro baingtateya, awiya Mama nana dema giro baingtateya.” Ayero sena ara.
43008020	Yesu nung ibu bainana atu mitasani awang wau-moni pugatinauwa auna nugu dopero ge tugata nasani aune ge awiya sena. Arata magayaora be nuna oko bao, arare awong nung oko sanao yewa.
43008021	Yesu mene awong eno nupema eyero sena, “Na niye doro babana na kau yero pasena ninae aune dema nete magayarineya. Na baungno narinena auna niye babao ine teng oko ara.”
43008022	Ayero senu Yuda emo mene eyero wina-se yewa, “Nung eyero siniya, ‘Na baungno narinena auna niye babao ine teng oko.’ Ge ayao awiya noeno siniye? Nung nutope taung nata dero magayari sinita?”
43008023	Ge ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Niye enakara. Na ikara. Niye tawingna. Na tawingna okowa.
43008024	Aeno na niye eno ayero sesena, ‘Niye pasena ninae aune dema nete magayarineya.’ Na susuwa nana keregatinona, awiya nigaya me oko yao yariniya, awiya niye pasena ninae aune dema nete magayarineya.”
43008025	Ayero senu awong nupema atata yero eyero sewa, “Ning aweni?” Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Na sinona nigitinowa.
43008026	Na pasena ninae daigairo keregairo niye gera pugari sero awega-ziwega yero baingtatena. Arata nung na senu wosiwang amimene ge me sinoiya. Arare nane be nuna-una atu nigiwang awiya gege tawingna etu keregatinona.” Ayero sena ara.
43008027	Nung Maung eno ayero senu awong oko giro baingtao yewa giro
43008028	nung nupema eyero sena, “Niye Emora Mani awiya i pasaora ikogairo aune susuwa nana garineya. Be aune na buro yero nona awiya kotumao nana-una oko yero nona awiya garineya. Mama mene gipena awiya puro nasani sinona awiya dema garineya.
43008029	Nung na senu wosiwang amimene na aune dema noiya. Be giti awiya buro nona a giro aratapunoiya. Arare nung na oko duwao na aune dema noiya.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43008030	Yesu ge ayero senu emo daigairo mene nung tumo diwa.
43008031	Awong awiya Yuda emo, arare Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Niye ge nana nigiro baingtiro diungno narineya, awiya niye mani dubu nana me yero narineya.
43008032	Niye ayero nasani ge me nigiro baingtaya amimene bunao ninae besariniya. Besai bunao aung iwaing narineya.”
43008033	Ayero senu abena eyero sewa, “Nae Abrahamna saisibuna. Nae emo zora soumani oko yero nonane. Nae bunao aung narinenane, awiya sesesa auna susuwa nono yero mitiye?”
43008034	Ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana nigipu. Zo nung pasena yero noiya amimene pasenana soumani yero noiya.
43008035	Soumani mene emo tuwa nuna-una ibu auna atu oko nao gege nariniya. Arata emo tuwara mani mene maungna ibu auna atu nao gege nariniya.
43008036	Arare Mani mene niye besariniya, awiya niye pasenana bunao aung narineya.
43008037	Niye Abrahamna saisibuna awiya na gosinena. Arata ge nana mene ninae-una mokora oko towao yero noiya, aeno niye na daya magayanese sineya.
43008038	Na Mama nana-una atu nona gosinasani naungwa awiya niye eno tugata yero nona, arata niye mene zo maung ninae-una nigiwa awiya yero nowa.”
43008039	Ayero senu awong abena eyero sewa, “Nae mama nanae Abraham.” Ayero sewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Niye Abrahamna saisibuna natei siya, awiya niye Abrahamna tani puro nateya.
43008040	Tuwa Bayaura-una atu ge me susuware nigiwang awiya niye eno tugata yero nona, aune niye noeno na dari sinei? Gorobo ayero yao awiya Abraham mene oko yero nauna.
43008041	Arata ninae zo maung ninae-una buro yero nowa.” Ayero senu awong eyero sewa, “Nae towangna mani okowa. Tuwa Bayau nung mama nanae dekaongka.”
43008042	Ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Maung ninae Tuwa Bayau siya, awiya niye na ara tamateya. Noeno okowata, na Tuwa Bayaura-una atu bumuwang. Na kotumao nana-una oko wosiwang. Tuwa Bayau mene senu wosiwang.
43008043	Niye noeno ge nana oko gao yero nowi? Niye oko gao yero nowa, noeno okowata, ge sinona awiya niye nigao teng oko.
43008044	Niye maung ninae Sanda auna mani awiso, arare aratamao nuna ago yero buro meko awiya yari sero sinowa. Nung gitau otu emo dedunaunu mamaganauwa, deka ayero yero butunoiya arauwa. Nung ge me oko puro noiya. Noeno okowata, ge me zo nuna-una oko mitiya. Ge iwao nuna mene nuna-una mokora atu beburo mitoiyare nung ge iwaora maung yero noiya.
43008045	Aeno ge me nana sinena, awiya nigitineya me aung ine niya.
43008046	Ninae-una zo mene na pasena emo ayero sai me yarinita? Aung ara. Na emo ayao amimene ge me susuware tugata yero nona niye noeno gosinowa me oko yao yero noiye?
43008047	Zo nung Tuwa Bayaura mani yero noiya amimene Tuwa Bayaura ge nigitinoiya. Niye Tuwa Bayaura mani oko yero nowa, aeno ge nuna awang sinowa arauwa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43008048	Ayero senu Yuda emo mene eyero sewa, “Nae ning eno eyero sinenane: Ning Samaria emo. Iwae mene nina-una mokora mitiya. Ning eno ayero sinenane awiya ge me ara.”
43008049	Ayero sewa Yesu mene eyero sena, “Iwae nana-una mokora oko mitiya. Na mama nana bowi yero nona, arata ninae mene zo yazo nana puro wowosinowa.
43008050	Na yazo bowire nana de ika yari oko sinona. Zo mitiya amimene yazo nana de ika gatinoiya. Nune zaz yero noiya.
43008051	Na memokoba sana nigipu. Zo nung ge nana nigiro puro nariniya amimene oko magayariniya. Nung nao gege nasani nariniya.”
43008052	Ge ayero senu Yuda emo awong eyero sewa, “Iwae nina-una mokora mitiya awiya gosinenane me niya. Abraham magayena nupema porofete ena awong deka ayero mamagayewa. Arata ning eyero sinesa, ‘Zo nung ge nana puro nasani nariniya amimene oko magayariniya.’
43008053	Mama naname Abraham magayena. Arata nine nung daigari sinesita? Porofete deka ayero magayewa ara. Ning noeno taung nina puro wiwitinesi?”
43008054	Ayero sewa Yesu mene awong eno eyero sena, “Na taung nana puro witana teng oko yariniya. Mama nana noiya, awiya niye Tuwa Bayau ninae asero nowa, nung amimene na bowi noiya.
43008055	Niye nung oko giro baingtitinowa. Nane mene zo giro baingtitinona. ‘Na nung oko gao nona,’ ayero satena, awiya na ge iwao ge sao emo ine yero niye ine yatena. Na nung giro baingtiti nasani ge nuna dipunasani nona.
43008056	Maung ninae Abraham nung kasa yaora be nana gari sero yawa yawa nasani nauna. Arare nung be nana giro yawa yawa yena.”
43008057	Ayero senu Yuda emo mene abena eyero sewa, “Ning dawang nina 50 oko yao amimene Abraham gasita?”
43008058	Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Na memokoba sana nigipu. Na Abraham oko kasa yaore naungwa nona era.”
43008059	Ayero senu awong daba puro nung daya magayaise sero yewa ibu mokora atu tara yero kasayena arauwa.
43009001	Yesu nung bautunete emo zo aira tiyangna atu diti guma yao kasa yero mitauna awiya tauna.
43009002	Ayero yenu buro-mani nuna mene nung atata yero eyero sewa, “Gipao emo, pasena ana mene aune emo ewiya diti guma yeni? Pasena nuna-unata aira maungna auna ing?”
43009003	Ayero sewa Yesu mene abena eyero sena, “Auna okowa. Pasena nuna-unata ai maungna auna okowata. Tuwa Bayau putoung nuna-una susuwa awiya emo euna-una atu kasa daung yai gaese ayero yena arauwa.
43009004	Emo bauno warire buro yero nowa ping itinoi buro dotinowa, deka ayao ine name na senu wosiwang auna buro warire nasani nanenese sao mitiya. Be zo bumai aune buro nuna yaora be aung yariniya.
43009005	Na tawingna etu narinena, auna teng waegao nana mene niye waegatinasani nariniya.”
43009006	Ayero sero begura ye tawingna gairo tawingne dema dawero puro emo auna ditira dupena ara.
43009007	Dupero iyengtiti nasani eyero sena, “Ning baungno Siloam ou ubutu ouna atu benaung nina sae.” Ayero sena arauwa. (Siloam awiya ge naname-una “Iyengtao.”) Arare emo awiya baungno ou ubutu auna atu diti moko saenu diti moko pagaina.
43009008	Diti moko pagainu yesese yenu otao manita emo bauno nung nona eno isa sero naunu gosinauwa amimene nung giro eyero sewa, “Nona eno isa sinasani mitoiya nung arita?”
43009009	Ayero sewa ena mene eyero sewa, “Nung arauwa.” Arata ena mene eyero sewa, “Nung okowata, mani zo nung ine ara.” Ayero sinewa nuka nutope eyero sena, “Zo ewe oko ara. Na era.”
43009010	Ayero senu awong nung atata yero eyero sewa, “Nono yetesa diti moko nina iwaing yetiye?” Ayero sewa nung eyero sena,
43009011	“Emo zo yazo nuna Yesu amimene tawing dawero diti moko nana-una dupero eyero sero iyengtiya, ‘Siloam ou ubutura baungno benaung nina sae.’ Ayero sesi baungno saetena diti moko nana pagaiya.”
43009012	Ayero senu awong atata yero sewa, “Emo awiya natu niye?” Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Na oko gao wa.” Ayero sena arauwa.
43009013	Ayero senu awong emo gitau diti guma yao nauna awiya puro baung Farisayo dubura-una yewa.
43009014	Yesu mene tawing dawero emo auna diti mokora dupenu pagaina, awiya Sabat iya aune yena.
43009015	Arare Farisayo emo awong deka ayero atata yero eyero sewa, “Ning nono yetesa diti moko nina pagaiye?” Ayero sewa emo diti guma yao amimene eyero sena, “Nung tawing dawero diti moko nana-una dupeti na baungno oura atu saetena diti moko nana pagaiya.”
43009016	Ayero senu Farisayo ena mene eyero sewa, “Emo awiya Sabat iyara sao tauyao ge awiya deduniya, arare nung Tuwa Bayaura-una atu oko buna.” Ayero sinewa aune nunae-una ena mene eyero sewa, “Nung emo meko nao siya, awiya tani putoungne ayao ine oko yatiya.” Ayero sinasani ge wina-se yero gagausewa.
43009017	Ayero sinete emo diti guma yao awiya atata yero eyero sewa, “Diti nina sesi pagaiya aeno ning nung giro nono kotupunesi?” Ayero sewa nung eyero sena, “Nung porofete.”
43009018	Ayero senu Yuda emo mene emo diti pagaina auna ge nigiro giro, “Gitau nung diti guma yao aungta,” asero ai maungne nuna yau sewa bumuwato atata yero eyero sewa,
43009019	“Ewiya mani ninato ing? Nung diti guma yao ka yero tiyangna atu kasa yenuta? Ora nung nono yero diti moko pagaiye?”
43009020	Ayero atata yewa abena eyero sewato, “Nung mani nanato awiya gosinenato. Nung diti guma yao tiyangna atu kasa yena, awiya gosinenato.
43009021	Arata nono yero diti moko pagaiye auna susuwa awiya nato oko gosinenato. Nupema awe mene diti nuna sesi iwaing yetiye? awiya nato oko gosinenato. Nung bairo emo yao, arare niye nung atata yepu sai gae.”
43009022	Maung aire nuna mene Yuda emo awang yero ge ayero sewato ara. Noeno okowata, Yuda emo awong ge yemaoko eyero sewa tauyena, “Zo nung Yesu eno ‘Nung Kristo’ asariniya, awiya nung tunero yere ibura atu awang sari nenane.”
43009023	Ayero sewa, arare ai maungne awongto awang yero eyero sewato, “Nung bairo emo yao, arare niye nung atata yepu sai gae.”
43009024	Awong emo diti guma yao awiya nupema sewa bunu eyero sewa, “Ning Tuwa Bayaura benaungna etu ge me se. Nae emo auna susuwa gosinenane. Nung emo meko.”
43009025	Ayero sewa nung abena eyero sena, “Nung emo mekota nono yao i? awiya na oko gosinena. Arata na diti guma yao nawe dotena diti moko nana pagaiya susuwa ami zo na gosinena.”
43009026	Ayero senu awong nupema atata yero eyero sewa, “Ning eno nono yetiye, o nono yero yeti diti moko nina pagaiye?”
43009027	Ayero sewa nung ge abena eyero sena, “Na niye eno mena sesena ara. Niye nono yero oko nigao sero nei? Noeno sesena matu deka awiya nupema sana nigari sinei? Niye dema buro-mani nuna yari sineita?”
43009028	Ayero senu awong nung gona nasani eyero sewa, “Nine buro-mani nuna zo yero nesa. Nanae mene zo Mosera buro-mani ara.
43009029	Tuwa Bayau mene Mose eno ge tugata yena amaze nigitinonane. Arata emo awiya natu kasa yero buni, awiya nae oko gosinonane.”
43009030	Ayero sewa emo diti moko pagaina amimene wawong di gauno eyero sena, “Niye kasa yao nuna-una susuwa oko gosinowa arata saineba, nung yeti diti nana pagaiya ara.
43009031	Name eyero nigitinonane: Tuwa Bayau mene emo memeko-mameko auna isa sao oko nigitinoiya. Arata zo nung Tuwa Bayau bowi nasani Tuwa Bayaura aratamao ago yariniya auna isa awiya Tuwa Bayau mene nigariniya.
43009032	Arata emo zo diti guma yao aira tiyangna atu kasa yenu aune zo senu diti pagaina auna ungwe zo oko mitiya. Name ungwe ayao ine gitau otu oko nigao butunasani naungwane nonane.
43009033	Arare emo awiya Tuwa Bayaura-una atu oko bao yati siya, awiya nung buro ayero yaine yao teng oko yatiya.”
